Su meta de crecimiento está enfocada en expandir su mercado, pero su capital de trabajo está rotando entre sus clientes de crédito,  y comprar en mayor volumen se convierte en un gran desafío, razón por el cual se acerca a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para acceder a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a esta organización, mediante el cual comprará productos que llegaron con precios competitivos, en sus dos catálogos, o guías especializadas de productos,como perfumes, cosméticos, articulos de hogar etc  y que su clientela le ha encargado en su visita de preventa.
texts.en:
Arminda, 59, is mother of two adult children; she lives with her spouse in the south part of the city.  She sells perfumery, women’s accessories, cosmetics and costume jewelry there.  Her experience started five years ago when she started the business in order to contribute to her home and to have cash for personal expenses and to help out her children.  

The items she sells are cleaning supplies and novelty items she offers by visiting customer to customer and granting them short-term credit.  She works Monday to Sunday from 8 in the morning to 6 in the evening.  Her main customers are located in her neighborhood and nearby areas.  

Her growth goal is focused on expanding her market share but her working capital is rotating among her credit customers so buying in large amounts becomes a big challenge and this is why she’s approached Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to request a Kiva loan, her first financing from this organization, by means of which she’ll buy catalog products like perfume, cosmetics, items for the home, etc. that are on special promotion with competitive prices that her customers have pre-ordered on her previous visits.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and items for the home.

loans.name: El Grupo H. Group

texts.es: Grupo solidario formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Darling mujer de 34 años, casada y con un hijo menor. Desde hace cinco años se dedica a la venta de ropa usada, está la comercializa al crédito y al contado en su vecindario y ambulante, tienes de ser cliente de la institución cuatro años consecutivos este crédito lo utilizara en la compra de paca de ropa de muy buena calidad como pantalones, chores, toallas, blusas de damas, pantalones de damas etc. Mayra tiene 40 años de edad y su negocio es la venta también de ropa usada y Julia tiene 33 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de ropa usada.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was formed by three entrepreneurs. 

One of them is Darling, a woman of 34 years of age, married with a young child. She has been a selling used clothing for 5 years, selling on credit and cash in her neighborhood, and as a street vendor. She has been a customer of the institution for 4 consecutive years. This loan will be used to buy a bale of good quality clothing such as pants, shorts, towels, ladies blouses, ladies slacks, etc.

Mayra is 40 years old and her business is also selling used clothing, and Julia is 33 years old and her business is selling used clothing.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of a bale of good quality clothing such as pants, shorts, towels, ladies blouses, ladies slacks, etc.

loans.name: Cristo Vive Group

texts.es: Este es un grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras cada socia cuenta con  sus negocios, una de ellas es Jhoana mujer de 48 años de edad, casada, tiene dos hijos menores y su negocio es la venta de tortilla actividad que viene realizando desde hace 3 años. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima como maíz, leña, cal, frijoles crudos por quintal porque va vender frijoles cocidos. Juana tiene 29 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de artesanía en barro y Josefa tiene 23 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de comida y arroz de leche.
texts.en:
This is a group made up of three enterprising members, and each member relies on their business. One of them is Jhoana, a 48-year-old woman, married with two children under 18. Her business is selling tortillas and she's been doing this work for three years. 

She will invest the loan in buying raw materials such as corn, firewood, lime, and raw beans by the quintal because she is going to sell cooked beans. 

Juana is 29 years old and her business is selling clay handicraft and Josefa is 23 and her business is selling food and rice pudding.

loans.use: to invest in buying raw materials like corn, firewood, lime, raw beans by the quintal e.t.c.

loans.name: Mauricio

texts.es: Don mauricio es un señor trabajador. el necesita arreglar su vehículo el cual utiliza para transportar estudiantes. necesita de un préstamo por setecientos cincuenta mil colones (750.000) para arreglar y asi cumplir con los requisitos necesarios para poder realizar este trabajo. para el este es el medio por el que obtiene los ingresos para brindarle una buena calidad de vida a su familia
texts.en: Mauricio is a hard worker. He needs to repair his vehicle, which he uses to transport students. He needs a loan of 750,000 colones for the repairs, so that he can meet the requirements needed to perform this job. This is his source of income, which allows him to give his family a good quality of life.

loans.use: repair his student transportation vehicle.

loans.name: Brisas De Mayo Group

texts.es: Juana, es miembro de un grupo formado por tres socios lo cual cada uno de ellos tienen sus pequeños negocios. Juana es una  mujer acompañada, tiene 52 años de edad  y su negocio es la venta de productos varios que comercializa de manera ambulantes, tiene 12 años de tener su negocio lo que le permite mantener a su familia. El crédito que está solicitando lo invertirá en la compra de varios productos como chinelas rolter, toallas grandes, vasos de plásticos, cucharas, prensa ropa, coladores, rayadores, baldes pequeños, lampazos de plásticos etc. Ivonne tiene 44 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de carne de res y Cristoffer tiene 19 años  de edad y vende verduras frescas.
texts.en: Juana is a successful and enterprising micro-entrepreneur, she belongs to a group made up of three members, each of whom have small businesses. Juana has a partner, she is 52 years old, and she makes a living selling various products from door-to-door. She has worked in this business for 12 years, which allows her to support her family. She will invest the loan she is requesting in buying various products such as Rolter flip flops, large towels, plastic glasses, spoons, a clothes press, sieves, graters, small buckets, plastic mops, etc. Ivonne is 44 years old and makes a living selling beef, and Cristoffer is 19 and sells fresh vegetables.

loans.use: to buy Rolter flip flops, large towels, plastic glasses, spoons, a clothes press, sieves, graters, small buckets, plastic mops, etc.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Doña Juana es una mujer de 43 años de edad, luchadora, emprendedora con un grado de educación secundario completo graduandoce como Perito Mercantil y Contador Publico casada y madre de 5 hijos de los cuales 2 de ellos estudian en primaria en diferentes grados de educación. Ella tiene mucha experiencia en el cultivo hortalizas como ser (papa, brócoli, coliflor) desde hace más de 15 años ya que fueron sus padres los que le enseñaron esta actividad desde muy pequeña que ha sido medio de sustento para su familia por muchos años y hoy en día sigue siéndolo. Ella no pudo ejercer su carrera por lo tanto se vio en la necesidad de aprender un oficio (corte y confección)de esta manera ella apoya a su esposo con los gastos del hogar y con la canasta básica. El terreno que ella y su esposo cultivan fue heredado por sus padres y los clientes para su producto son vecinos e intermediarios que vienen a la zona para adquirir su producto.   

Actualmente solicita ayuda para poder invertir en su siembra de papa y brócoli comprando fertilizantes, abono, y bombas para fumigación manteniendo sano su cultivo y seguro de plagas y animales.

Su sueño es poder cultivar una variedad de productos para poder ofrecer a sus clientes una mejor variedad y tengan más opciones de compra ya que de esa manera ella podrá generar más ingresos para su familia y podrá invertir en sus cultivos hasta poder trabajar con capital propio para apoyar a sus hijos en sus estudios y convertirlos en profesionales.
texts.en:
Juana, 43, is hardworking and tenacious. She completed secondary school with a degree as a chartered accountant and public accountant. She is married and the mother of 5 children, two of whom are in different grades in primary school. She has more than 15 years of experience growing vegetables like potatoes, broccoli and cauliflower - a skill her parents taught to her from a very young age that has been her family's sustenance for many years and still is. She could not work in her career, so she saw the need to learn a new trade (sewing) so that she can support her husband with their household expenses and cost of food. The land that they plant on was inherited from her parents, and she sells her products to neighbors and intermediaries who come to the area to buy.

Currently she asks for a loan to invest in planting potatoes and broccoli through the purchase of fertilizers, composts and fumigation bombs to keep her crop healthy and safe from pests and animals. 

Her dream is to be able to grow a variety of products so that she can offer her customers more options and they will have more choices of what to buy. This will give her more income for her family that she could invest in her crops until she has enough capital to support her students through all of their studies and see them become professionals.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, composts, and fumigating devices for her crops

loans.name: Daniel Santiago

texts.es:
Su nombre es Daniel, en este momento se encuentra en un técnico laboral por competencias en cocina en la jornada de la mañana 
En su casa tiene lo necesario para obtener un buen desempeño académico y personal, vive con sus papas y su hermano mayor que también  se encuentra en su formación profesional como arquitecto, el año pasado terminó sus estudios de bachiller completos y tuvo apoyo del colegio para hacer actividades extracurriculares en una fundación  en donde tomo un curso de pastelería con un muy buen desempeño y buscando la visión de estudiar algo relacionado con esta profesión 
Vive con sus papas y su hermano como ya había mencionado, en donde sus papas se desempeñan laboralmente como transportadores escolares teniendo una gran demanda laboral por su buena prestación de servicios, su mama también curso su bachiller y lo realizo completamente al igual que su papa, su mama curso una tecnología en sistemas y confesión de alta costura también logrando su culminación con el apoyo de sus padres, su papa realizo una tecnología en mecánica automotriz que al igual que ella lo termino satisfactoriamente y logrando entrar a un puesto de trabajo en una marca reconocida de automóviles en el cual duro laborando 9 años 
En el caso de su mama también prestó servicios de mantenimiento de pc y redes de Internet en el cual no duro mucho tiempo, después laboro como confesionista de alta costura para una marca reconocida de moda en el cual se desempeñó por 2 años consecutivos y logrando también un buen reconocimiento laboral y económico con el cual los mantenía en los estudios colegiales 
En cuanto a el, fue uno de los mejores alumnos del colegio logrando así un reconocimiento estudiantil o una mención de honor al obtener el titulo en la graduación como bachiller 
Estuvo en proyectos de investigación en el colegio y también dirigió un grupo de danza y actuación en el que ayudo al desempeño académico de algunos compañeros de estudio por su buen rendimiento 
Bueno esto es una pequeña parte de su vida y de su cotidianidad gracias por su aporte económico que ayuda a muchos estudiantes a obtener un mejor rendimiento académico y un beneficio económico……
texts.en:
His name is Daniel and he is taking a morning course in cooking that will entitle him to work in culinary. At home, he has everything he needs to develop personally and academically. He lives with his parents and with his older brother, who is studying to become an architect. Last year, Daniel finished high school and received support from his school to undertake additional activities in an institution where he took a course in bakery. He was a very good student and looks forward to continuing with his studies in this area.

As mentioned before, he lives with his parents and with his brother. His parents work transporting kids to their school and have a high demand, thanks to the good service they offer. Both his parents also finished high school. His mother studied computer science and tailoring supported by her parents and his father studied automotive mechanics and after finishing, he was enrolled in a renowned car company where he worked hard for nine years.

Daniel’s mother worked also repairing computers and networks, but not for long. She then worked as an haute couture tailor for a renowned company for two years. Her work was appreciated and she had a good income to support her children’s studies.

Daniel was one of the best students of his generation and received an honorable mention when he graduated. He took part in different research projects at school, directed a dancing and acting group and helped some of his friends to improve their performance, since he was good himself.

Well, this is just a small part of his life and his everyday activities. Thank you for your support and for helping many students to improve their performance at school and their economy.

loans.use: to finish his cooking studies

loans.name: Kolab

texts.en:
Kolab, 52 and married, is a farmer from the Bovel district of Battambang province.  She has eight children, but only two of them are dependent on her as they are still in school. To feed her family, she does rice cropping on a five hectare area; it is the only source of income. Her 13 years in the current business returns about 41,000 KHR per day. 

Kolab, a first-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), is seeking for a loan of 2,500,000 KHR to buy a mini-tractor to support her farmland. 

She hopes this purchase will help her reduce expenses related to the plowing fee, and will enable her to gain more income.

loans.use: To buy a mini-tractor to support her farmland

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora is married with five children. She is 50 years old, and lives in the Philippines.

Leonora is a farmer, and grows rice and corn to earn a living. She has been doing this for 20 years. 

She has requested a loan to purchase fertilizer and other supplies needed for rice and corn production. 

Leonora has been a member of PMPC for 9 years.

loans.use: To purchase ten sacks of fertilizer and other supplies for her farm.

loans.name: Poan's Group

texts.en:
A mother of four children residing in Bovel district of Battambang province, Poan is 44 years old and a rice farmer in the local area. She has been  involved in the rice growing business for five years. 

This is not the first loan for Poan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has repaid her past loan completely, which has enabled her to support her daily cost of living and keep her children in school. Now, in a group of two, she is the leader. 

Poan is seeking a loan for 4,000,000 KHR while her co-borrower is requesting 2,000,000 KHR. As the leader, she will spend her portion to buy fertilizer  and corn seed for her farmland, to gain extra income. 

She highly hopes that she can earn a high yield from both cash-crops, and make a good profit.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and corn seed for her farmland.

loans.name: Pablo Enrique

texts.es: Pablo, de 39 años de edad, habita en  la comarca Las Canoas él se dedica a la venta de calcetas, calzones, brazier, lapiceros. Pablo dice que su primer crédito Kiva le ayudo mucho ya que pudo surtir un poco más su negocio y obtener un poco de ganancia que le ayudo a cubrir los gastos del nacimiento de su  5to hijo. Pablo en su primer crédito compro diferentes productos  tales como,  brazier, calcetines, bikinis etc. En este segundo crédito Pablo piensa siempre invertirlo en el reforzamiento de su negocio comprando camisetas, topless, calcetines, brazier, calzones, pinturas de uñas y diferentes cosméticos también dice que con este nuevo crédito podrá aumentar un poco más el inventario de su negocio y así obtener un poco más de ganancia que le ayudaran a  cubrir los gastos de la casa.  También dice que siempre seguirá luchando cada día  trabajando fuerte para ir surtiendo su negocio y aumentando su clientela.
texts.en: 39-year-old Pablo lives in the rural district of Las Canoas. He sells stockings, boxer shorts, bras and crayons. Pablo reports that his first Kiva loan helped him a great deal, since he was able to stock his business a little more. It also allowed him to turn a small profit that helped him cover the expenses with the birth of his 5th child. With his first loan, Pablo purchased various products such as bras, socks, bikinis, etc. As for this second loan, Pablo always intends to use it to boost his business by purchasing t-shirts, underwear, socks, bras, boxer shorts, nail polish, and various types of cosmetics. He also reports that this new loan will allow him to stock up his business a bit more. That way he'll earn some more profits that will help him to afford his household expenses. He also reports that he'll always keep on striving on a daily basis and working hard in order to stock up his business and expand his clientele.

loans.use: to purchase clothing.

loans.name: Rosalío

texts.es:
Rosalío es un señor casado de 27 años, tiene 3 hijos (2 hombres y 1 mujer)  quienes viven en el municipio de Sololá.
El se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 10 años, eligió está actividad ya que de esta manera obtiene ingresos para aportar a la economía familiar, otro beneficio que obtiene de esta actividad es que lo realiza al lado de su familia sin verse en la necesidad de emigrar a otro país.
El está solicitando un préstamo de Q 3,500.00 para capital de trabajo para compra de semillas y fertilizantes para cultivo de papa.
Uno de sus mayores sueños es  ampliar su actividad agrícola para obtener mejores ganancias  y así poder construir su casa.
texts.en:
Rosalío is a married man who is 27 years old and has three children (two sons and a daughter).  He lives with his family in the town of Sololá.  

Rosalío has been a farmer for 10 years.  He chose this line of work because it allows him to generate income to support his family financially.  Another benefit from this type of work is that he can be near his family without the need of having to migrate to another country.  

Rosalío is requesting a loan of 3,500 GTQ to use as operating capital to purchase seeds and fertilizers for growing potatoes.  One of his greatest wishes is to expand his farming business so that he can generate more income and build a house.

loans.use: to use as operating capital to purchase seeds and fertilizers for growing potatoes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fruit such as watermelon, oranges, bananas, and dairy products

loans.name: Luna De Abril Group

texts.es: Este grupo formado por tres empresarias una de ellas es Jannet tiene43 años de edad, soltera sin hijo, su negocio es la venta de chinelas variadas desde hace 10 años, estas las vende ambulantes y en los mercados cercanos a su localidad, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de chinelas de esponjas, chinelas sport de hule, chinelas de hule global, chinelas de hombres etc. Rosibel tiene 59 años de edad y su negocio es venta de cosméticos y ropa usada y Nubia tiene 48 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de chinelas.
texts.en: This group consists of three entrepreneurs. One of them is Janet, who is 43 years old, childless and single. She has been selling a variety of shoes for the past 10 years. She sells them door-to-door as well as in markets close to where she lives. She will use the loan to purchase flip-flops, sports shoes, rubber slippers, men's sandals, etc. Rosibel is 59 years old and she sells cosmetics and second hand clothes for a living. And Nubia is 48 years old and sells sandals.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of flip-flops, sports shoes, rubber slippers, men's sandals, etc.

loans.name: Vanessa

texts.es:
Ella es una mujer de 22 años. Contando de ella un momento de su vida que para ella fue el mejor a pesar de las circunstancias. 
Y de qué mal o bien adelantaba un paso de su vida a temprana edad, cuando ella termina su bachillerato, una de sus grandes metas era estudiar y realizarse tanto personalmente como profesionalmente. Pero se cruza en ella el amor y toma la decisión de dejar a un lado su propósito de estudiar y convertirse en madre. Aunque esto para sus padres no era lo mejor, y ver una de sus hijas mayores con un futuro de madre y no de una profesional como ellos quisieron verla, decidieron respetar su decisión y apoyarla en su proceso de madre. Aún sigue con la ilusión de convertirse en una profesional y salir adelante con su hija por eso actualmente se encuentra estudiando Arte Gráfico y Publicitario inicio este año va en primer semestre y con muchas ganas de terminar todas sus metas propuestas entre ellas su carrera.
Claro resaltando que ella deja por decir que el ser madre ha sido la experiencia más hermosa de su vida y que es el regalo más lindo que Dios le ha dado.
texts.en:
This student is a 22-year-old woman.  She tells of what is the best moment in her life despite her circumstances.  

Despite the good and the bad, she was able to make her way through life at an early age.  When she finished high school, one of her goals was to study and grow on both a personal and professional level.  However, she fell in love and decided to postpone her studies so that she could become a mother.  Her parents did not think this was a good idea since they did not want to see one of their grown daughters spend her future as a mother without becoming a professional as they had envisioned.  However, they respected her decision and supported her in the process of becoming a mother.  She continued to hold on to the dream of becoming a professional so that she could move forward along with her daughter.  She is currently enrolled in Graphic Arts and Advertising and will be starting her first semester this year.  With great determination, she plans to accomplish all of her goals, which include earning her degree.  

By taking the time to describe her experience of becoming a mother as the most beautiful thing in her life, it is clear that this is the loveliest gift that God has given her.

loans.use: to finish her academic program in Graphic Arts and Advertising

loans.name: Kurbonbuvy

texts.ru: Курбонбуви очень трудолюбивая и целеустремлённая женщина. С самых ранних лет она  занималась скотоводством. После занятий в школе она всегда помогала родителям, а данный момент она разведенная и живет с родителями и двумя братьям. Семья живёт только на доходы от животноводства.  Родители уже старые, в бизнесе ей помогает только братья. У них 3 голов скота, но она хочет, увеличит количество скота еще два раза и у нее еще есть  мечта открыть свою маленькую  ферму.  Она посоветовалась с братьями,что она купит им билетов, отправляет их в Российскую Федерацию. Они будут там зарабатывать деньги, и отправлять Курбонбуви для продолжения бизнеса. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 4000 сомони для покупки авиабилетов  для братьев, а сама хочет продолжать бизнес и надеется на Вашу доброту.
texts.en: Kurbonbuvy is a very hardworking and ambitious woman.  Since she was young, she has bred cattle.  After her school lessons, she always helped her parents.  She is currently divorced and lives with her parents and two brothers.  Her family lives only on the income from their livestock.  Her parents are already old, only her brothers help her with the business.  They have 3 head of cattle, and she wants to double this number.  She also dreams of starting her own small farm.  She has consulted with her brothers and wants to buy them plane tickets so they can travel to Russia.  There, they will earn money and send it back to Kurbonbuvy to continue their business.  She is asking for a loan of 4,000 somoni to buy these tickets for her brothers so she herself can continue the business.  She relies on your kindness.

loans.use: To buy a plane ticket for her brothers who want go to Russia to find work

loans.name: Yudy Alexandra

texts.es:
Su Nombre Es Alexandra tiene 19 años, Vive En una hermosa ciudad con su familia mama papa y hermanos.
Es Una Mujer De Principios Con muchos sueños y metas por cumplir.
Toda su etapa escolar fue en el colegio  fue graduada y con honores siempre en los primeros puestos y en cueta para todo. 
Salió con muchos ánimos para realizar sus metas y propósitos. Pero por una crisis familiar no quería estudiar este año, sus papas no permitieron eso así que decidió  poco  a poco ir buscando donde estudiar.Su sueño siempre fue estudiar primera infancia pero es una carrera que toca dar mucho para recibir poco así que su  segunda opción era estudiar cocina empezó   a buscar donde estudiar Hasta que por cosas de la vida llego a la institución  se asesoró sobre sus carreras, y lo que quería que era cocina le gusto, hablo con sus papas para al día  siguiente llevar la plata y los papeles para matricularse. Se matriculo y esperaba ansiosamente empezar, lleva 3 meses estudiando lo que quiere, le gusta lo que hace y sueña con ser alguien importante para la sociedad y para personas especiales en su vida.
texts.en:
Alexandra, 19, lives in a beautiful city with her family, mother, father, and siblings.  She's a principaled woman with a lot of dreams and goals to accomplish.

Her entire education was in high school.  She graduated with honors, always in the top spots in everything.  She left with a lot of desire to achieve her goals.  Because of a family crisis, however, she couldn't study that year; her parents didn't allow it.  So she decided to look into where to study little by little.  Her dream was always to study early childhood, but it's a career where you have to give a lot to receive a little, so her second option was to study cooking.

She began to look for a place to study until she just ended up at the institution.  She was counseled about careers, and what she liked was cooking.  She spoke to her parents about getting the money for the next day and doing the paperwork to register.  She registered and anxiously waited to begin.

She has been studying what she wants for three months.  She likes what she does and she dreams of being someone important for society and for special people in her life.

loans.use: to finish her culinary program

loans.name: Sandra Milena

texts.es:
Ella se llama Sandra tiene 22 años, su historia cuenta  sobre la pérdida de un ser querido, de cómo superar ese dolor; Muchos prevalecen el sufrimiento más rápido  que otros, algunos aun no lo asimilan, es sencillo recordar las cosas que podrian haber hecho si esa persona estuviese aun aca… viene a la  mente: Los paseos, los almuerzos especiales, y de más cosas que podría disfrutar con su brillante compañía.
En este caso su  padre fallece de un cáncer hepático (cáncer en el hígado), cuyo tiempo fue tan corto que ni el viento logro enfriar las lagrimas de tal dolor, sin embargo, ella tenía una meta, una promesa que cumplir, graduarse de técnica administrativa, darle ese orgullo a pesar de saber que no estaría allí, en la primera fila aplaudiendo mientras decía su nombre, fue lo que basto para recordarlo y darse cuenta que aunque ellos no estén siempre frente a ti no quiere decir que te han abandonado, por el contrario están más presentes que nunca.
Se debe dejarlos ir, ellos necesitan estar en paz y más que nunca estarán esperando con los brazos abiertos para dar la bienvenida… Es difícil afrontar una pérdida de tal magnitud como lo es el fallecimiento de un ser querido. Lamentablemente el paso por la vida es tan corto que sentimos que el tiempo no es suficiente para hacer lo que queremos o para expresar todo nuestro afecto a las personas que más se quiere.
El perder a un ser querido es un hecho que no se puede remediar, pero sí se puede optar por mantener una buena actitud ante la vida, por ello es importante que los amigos siempre estén al tanto de quien lo necesita, para darle ánimos de seguir y afrontar el reto por venir. 
Aunque ella piensa en tener un futuro prospero, porque ahora quiere ser técnica profesional en contabilidad financiera, terminar con las mejores notas y un alto concepto con el cual se pueda defender en un excelente cargo, quiere tener una vida prospera donde pueda brindarle la ayuda suficiente a su familia, ser más adelante administradora de empresas en una compañía exitosa que le nutre de mas conocimiento y liderar el marketing, en la parte sentimental tener un bonito hogar, ya por ultimo ella quisiera  ser dueña y jefe de una empresa que brinde apoyo a cualquier persona que lo necesite, garantizándole el bienestar para su salud.
texts.en:
Sandra Milena is 22 years old.  Her story is about the loss of a loved one and how to overcome that pain.  Many people get over the suffering faster than others and some people don't absorb it.  It is easy to remember the things could have been done if that person was still here.  Things come to mind like walks, special lunches, and more things that she could have enjoyed with their brilliant company.  In her case, her father died of liver cancer.  His time was so short that not even the wind succeeded in cooling the tears from that pain.  However, she had a goal, a promise to keep of graduating from technical school, to give him that pride even though he knew he would not be there to applaud in the front row when they called her name.  That was enough to remember and she realized that although people are not always in front of you, they have not abandoned you, and in fact they are more present than not.  

Let them go since they need to be in peace and more than ever they will be waiting with open arms.  It is hard to confront a loss of such magnitude as the death of a loved one.  Unfortunately the way through life is so short it feels that the time is not enough to do or express all the affection for the people who are loved the most.  The loss of a loved one is a fact that cannot be remedied, but there is a choice to maintain a good attitude towards life.  It is important that friends are with one to give encouragement to continue and meet the challenge to come.

Sandra thinks about having a prosperous future because she wants to be a technical professional in financial accounting, finish with the best grades, and a high concept that she can defend with an excellent position.  She wants to have a prosperous life where she can provide the necessary help to her family.  Later, she would like to be a business administrator at a successful company that provides knowledge and is a leader in marketing.  Sentimentally, she would like to have a beautiful home.  Lastly, she wants to be the owner and boss of a business that provides support to whatever person needs it, ensuring well-being for her health.

loans.use: to finish her financial accounting program.

loans.name: Priscila

texts.es: Priscila, de 27 años de edad es una mujer amable y muy buena, esta casada con Mauro desde hace 8 años y vive en la casa de sus suegros en donde tiene acondicionado un pequeño espacio que lo habita junto a sus dos hijos.Priscila se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir de distintos sexos, modelos, tamaños y colores. De manera periódica realiza la compra de su mercadería la misma que pone a la venta entre sus amigos, vecinos, familiares y otras personas conocidas bajo el sistema de ventas crediticia. Realiza el cobro de manera diaria, semanal o quincenal dependiendo del acuerdo al que haya llegado con sus clientes.Le agrada mucho trabajar vendiendo prendas de vestir porque le permite conocer nuevos clientes y generar sus propios ingresos, ha visto que las ganancias son muy buenas y es por eso que desea consolidar con el paso del tiempo una pequeña tienda de venta de ropas. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1200 soles, está muy agradecida por la oportunidad crediticia que le brindan y por el respaldo financiero que necesita para seguir adelante. Con el monto solicitado comprará un lote de prendas de vestir conformada por polos, jeans, pantalones, blusas, camisas y shorts para ponerlos a la venta entre sus clientes.
texts.en:
27-year-old Priscila is a kind, very good woman. She's been married to Mauro for the past 8 years and she lives in her in-law's house. There she set up a small space where she lives with her two children. Priscila sells garments of various genders, designs, sizes and colors. She buys her merchandise on a regular basis and then sells it among her friends, neighbors, relatives and other acquaintances under a credit system. She collects payments on a daily, weekly or biweekly basis, depending on the agreement she reached with the customers. She very much enjoys selling clothing because it allows her to meet new customers and get an income of her own. She has realized that the profits are very good and that's why she wishes to establish a small clothing store someday. 
On this occasion she'll request 1200 soles. She's very thankful for the opportunity to get this loan and for the financial support that she needs to get ahead. With the requested amount she'll purchase a batch of garments comprised of polo shirts, jeans, trousers, blouses, shirts and shorts in order to sell them to her customers.

loans.use: to purchase clothing such as polo shirts, trousers, blouses, etc.

loans.name: Sergia

texts.en:
Sergia works hard to support her family. Sergia is married and has a business in the Philippines buying and selling used clothing.

Sergia requested a PHP 30000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional bundles of used clothing to sell.

Sergia has been in this business for 14 years now.

In the future, Sergia would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional bundles of used clothing to sell

loans.name: Brígida

texts.es: Doña Brígida es una señora con 45 años de edad, soltera y tiene cuatro hijos. Vive con su compañero en unión libre y también con dos hijos, uno menor y otro mayor de edad. Es trabajadora, sencilla y con muchos deseos de superación. Se dedica a su negocio desde hace nueve años. Ella hace pan casero, repostería. Utiliza el horno de su cocina. Se levanta desde muy temprano para empezar sus tareas en el negocio y durante el día salir a venderlos, debido a que para ella una de las cosas primordiales son sus ventas, ya que éstas le van a ayudar a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. Cuenta con el apoyo de una hija en los quehaceres domésticos y para su negocio. Es primera vez que solicita financiamiento a la Fundación para hacer crecer su patrimonio.
texts.en: Brígida is a 45 year old woman. She is single and has four children. She lives with her partner in a common law marriage with her two children. One is a minor and one is grown. She is hardworking, humble and really wants to get ahead. She has worked at her business for nine years. She makes homemade bread and pastries. She uses the oven in her kitchen. She gets up very early to start her tasks at the business and during the day she goes out to sell her product. For her one of the most important things are her sales, since they help improve her and her family's quality of life. She has a daughter's help with the housework and the business. This is the first time she has asked for a loan from the Fundación to grow her assets.

loans.use: to buy an industrial oven and raw materials.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Doña Ana es una clienta con trayectoria en la Fundación. Tiene cuarenta y dos años, vive con su único hijo y con su compañero. Siempre se ha dedicado a las costuras. Ella tiene gran experiencia en corte y confección de prendas tales como cortinas, set de baños, sábanas, pijamas y costuras a la medida. En su casa tiene un cuarto acondicionado como taller de costura. Tiene varias máquinas de coser, de las cuales una se le dañó y debido a eso es que pide un préstamo para comprarse otra de mejor calidad. Asi mejorar la calidad y acabado de sus prendas y dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en: Ana is a client who has a history with the Fundación. She is forty two and lives with her only son and her partner. She has always worked as a seamstress. She has a lot of experience with cutting and sewing things such as curtains, bathroom sets, sheets, pajamas and clothes to order. In her house, she has a room set up as a workshop. She has several sewing machine and one of them has broken. That is why she has asked for a loan to buy another one of better quality. This way, she will improve the quality and finishing touches of her work and give her customers a better service.

loans.use: to buy an industrial overlock sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw materials (iron, rubber and plastic)

loans.name: Carlos Julio

texts.es:
Carlos de 69 años de edad, se ha caracterizado por ser un hombre emprendedor, a su edad, lo que le sobran son ganas de trabajar. Asegura que sus dos hijos de diez y siete años de edad, son su mayor motivación.
Desde hace tres años montó una tienda dedicada a la venta de productos de la canasta familiar con el fin de mejorar su condición económica y generar una fuente de ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar, ya que por su edad, el mundo laboral le cerró las puertas.
Hoy se encuentra en búsqueda de un crédito con el fin de incrementar su portafolio de productos y aumentar sus ventas. Espera que con dicha inversión pueda garantizarles a su familia una calidad de vida digna y educación a sus dos hijos.
texts.en:
Carlos, who is 69 years old, is characterized by being an entrepreneurial man. At his age, he has a great will to work. He affirms that his two children, ages 10 and 7, are his biggest motivation.

Three years ago he set up a store dedicated to the sale of basic food products, with the goal of improving his economic condition and generating a source of income to sustain his household since because of his age, the working world has closed it doors to him.

Now he is in search of a loan with the goal of expanding his portfolio of products and increasing his sales. He hopes that with this investment he can guarantee his family a dignified quality of life and education for his two children.

loans.use: to buy basic food products for his store.

loans.name: Lat's Group

texts.en: Lat, 41, is married and blessed with three children—two schoolchildren and one paid worker. She and the rest of her family are living in Battambang province’s Ek Phnom district. Her main source of family income is from rice cropping. To earn additional income, her husband works for another employer for a fee.  From the current business, she is able to earn up to 37,000 KHR per day.  Lat is an eight-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). The past loans, which she has repaid completely, have upgraded her living status in a gradual manner and provided her decent meals for her kids. Now, she is in a group of three to apply for a new loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She and one of her joint members are seeking 1,400,000 KHR each, while her remaining member is applying for 1,200,000 KHR. For Lat as the group leader, she will use her loan portion to pay the plowing fee and to purchase rice seed for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice timely and fruitfully so as she can make more income to better her lifestyle.

loans.use: To pay the plowing fee and to purchase rice seed

loans.name: Choeurt's Group

texts.en: Chhoeurt is 53 and a local villager from Battambang province. He has six children, two of whom still depend on him as they are still in school.  For him, rice farming is the primary source of income, which he has been with for 34 years, earning about 26,000 KHR per day. With this loan, he will be a fourth-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). He has succeeded in managing his past loans, which he has repaid completely to support his living as well as his business. Now, he joins a group of two to apply for a new loan as he is in need of working capital.  As the group leader, he will use his loan portion to buy fertilizer, rice seed, and to pay for the plowing fee. He hopes to double his income and make more profit.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, rice seed, and to pay for plowing fee.

loans.name: Carlos León

texts.es:
“Existen muchas personas que viven en sus palacios y el dinero no es una preocupación, pero para otros, este es el karma de cada día” Con estas palabras Carlos de 61 años de edad, explica la labor que realiza diariamente desde la una de la mañana en la plaza de mercado en donde comercializa plátano y tomate, a fin de generar el sustento para su familia. 
Inició la actividad desde hace cinco años, cuando sufrió un accidente en su lugar de trabajo en el cual se desempeñaba como obrero de construcción. 
Hoy gracias a su actividad ha logrado sostener a sus hijos y esposa. 
Con la intención de mejorar su calidad de vida, Carlos se encuentra solicitando un crédito que destinará en la compra de plátano y tomate lo que le permitirá aumentar las ventas y mejorar los ingresos.
texts.en:
"There are many people who live in their palaces and money is not a worry, but for others, this is the karma of every day." With these words, Carlos, who is 61 years old, explains the work that he does daily from one in the morning in the market plaza, where he sells bananas and tomatoes with the goal of generating sustenance for his family.

He began this work five years ago, when he suffered an accident at his workplace, where he was a construction worker.

Today, thanks to his business, he has succeeded in supporting his children and his wife.

With the aim of improving his quality of life, Carlos is applying for a loan that will be destined for the purchase of bananas and tomatoes, which will allow him to increase his sales and improve his income.

loans.use: to buy bananas and tomatoes to sell

loans.name: Ma. Teresa's Group

texts.en:
Ma. Teresa is married with 4 children. She is 41 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Ma. Teresa is a farmer and grows assorted crops such as vegetables to earn a living. She has been doing this for 6 years. She has requested a loan to acquire a parcel of land on which to grow coconut trees. 

Ma. Teresa has been a member of PMPC for almost 4 years. 

Ma. Teresa is the leader of a 2-person group.  Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has his or her own business.

loans.use: to acquire a parcel of land to plant coconut trees.

loans.name: Enny Isabel

texts.es: Enny de 40 años de edad es madre soltera de cuatro hijos, se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora. Su mayor deseo fue montar su propio negocio y dedicarles mas tiempo a sus hijos; con sacrificio y disciplina logró alcanzarlo. Hoy cuenta con un pequeño taller dedicado a la confección directa y gracias a éste, su familia goza de mejores condiciones de vida. Se encuentra solicitando un crédito que destinará en la compra de telas e hilos con el fin de comenzar a fabricar prendas de vestir que serán comercializadas en diferentes almacenes de su localidad. Sueña con brindarles a sus hijos una educación de calidad.
texts.en: Enny, who is 40 years old, is a single mother with four children. She is characterized by being an entrepreneurial woman. Her greatest desire was to set up her own business and spend more time with her children. With sacrifice and discipline she has managed to achieve this. Today she has a little workshop dedicated to direct construction, and thanks to this, her family enjoys better living conditions. She is applying for a loan that will be destined for the purchase of fabrics and thread with the goal of beginning to make articles of clothing that will be sold in different stores in her area. She dreams of offering her children a quality education.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and thread

loans.name: Buntheng's Group

texts.en:
Age 38 and married, Buntheng is a rural villager residing in Kampong Cham Province. She covers daily food consumption via clothes tailoring and pig-raising with support from her husband. Her 13-year engagement in the current business has returned her about 19,000 riels (KHR) per day and she saves about 9,000 KHR per day.

This is not the first loan for Buntheng with Kiva’s partner VisionFund. She has used her past loan in an effective way to uplift her lifestyle and her business. Moreover, she can afford to buy necessary housing materials also from the decent income that she has gained. 

Now she is in a group of two to apply for a new loan. She and her fellow group member are seeking 1,200,000 KHR and 1,000,000 KHR respectively. As the group leader, she will use her loan portion to buy more fabric to make clothes and for resale. She hopes this purchase will help her to purchase good fabric on time to produce more clothes as samples to attract more customers and make more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy more fabric to make clothes and for resale

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: America (Flat) Group

texts.es:
El Grupo America esta conformado por 6 personas cada una de ellas desarrolla una actividad economica con el objetivo de brindar a sus familias una mejor calidad de vida :  Guadalupe venta de refrescos, Teresa venta de cosmeticos, Lucia Emilia venta de pollo, Enriqueta venta de zapatos, Maria venta de tortillas. Este grupo se encuenta ubicado en San Miguel Soyaltepec el cual se caracteriza por estar a la orilla de la presa de Cerro de Oro.

Teresa  tiene la edad de 30 años, estudio secundaria y esta casa con Ivan, ellos tiene 2 hijos el mayor estudia la primaria y el mas pequeño asiste al preescolar, Teresa platica que desde muy pequeña la enseñaron a trabajar y cuando se caso quería seguir haciéndolo para ayudar a su esposo a forjar un patrimonio para la familia que esperaban tener, así que inicio a vender calzado y cosméticos por catalogo con sus amigos de la comunidad, ella realiza sus ventas de casa en casa va mostrando sus catálogos y levantando pedidos los cual posteriormente surte y entrega, ella comenta que no tiene que salir a otras comunidades a vender ya que su comunidad es grande, también dice que como ya tiene mucho años en el negocio sin salir algunas ocasiones la van a buscar para pedirle sus catálogos. Lo que mas le gusta a Teresa de su actividad es que la realiza en su tiempo libre y gana su propio dinero.un préstamo de Visión Fund le dará  la oportunidad de comprar de variedad de perfumes, sombras, esmaltes, delineadores, maquillajes, labiales y variedad de calzado.
Ella desea que su negocio continué progresando para continuar dándole estudios a sus pequeños y le gustaría invertir sus ganancias en la compra de bisutería.

Este grupo agradece el apoyo que Visión Fund le esta brindando atravez de estos créditos.
texts.en:
The "America" communal bank is comprised of six people. Each one of them runs a business with the goal of improving their families' living conditions: Guadalupe sells refreshments, Teresa sells cosmetics, Lucia Emilia sells chicken, Enriqueta sells shoes, and Maria sells tortillas. This communal bank is located in San Miguel Soyaltepec, which is known for being on the shores of the Cerro de Oro lake.

Teresa is 30 years old. She completed middle school and she's married to Ivan. They have two children; the eldest one goes to elementary school and the younger one attends preschool. Teresa was taught to work at a very young age. When she got married, she wanted to keep on working in order to help her husband acquire assets for the family they intended to start. That's why she began selling shoes and cosmetics by catalog to her friends within the community. She sells door-to-door by showing her catalogs and taking orders which she then provides and delivers. She reports that she doesn't need to go out to other villages to sell because her community is large. She also reports that since she has been in the business for several years, even on the few occasions when she doesn't go out, people come to her to request her catalogs. What Teresa enjoys the most about her business is that she works during her free time and earns her own money. A loan from Visión Fund will allow her to purchase a variety of perfumes, eye shadows, nail polishes, eyeliners, makeup, lipsticks and shoes.
She wishes that her business continues to do well so that she can keep on providing her little ones with an education. She'd like to invest her profits in the purchase of costume jewelry.

This communal bank gives thanks for the support that Visión Fund provides through these loans.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of perfumes, eye shadows, nail polishes, eyeliners, makeup, lipsticks and shoes.

loans.name: Anabel

texts.en:
Anabel works hard to support her family. She is married and has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines.

Anabel requested a 10000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase carrots, cabbage, and other vegetables to sell. 

Anabel has been in this business for 5 years now.

In the future, Anabel would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase carrots, cabbage, and other vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José, se dedica a la venta de hielo y gas. Él vive en casa propia con su esposa y su madre, tiene dos hijos, los cuales tiene edades de 5 y 14 años, este negocio lo realiza desde hace mucho tiempo atrás. 
El préstamo que requiere lo invertirá en la compra de una motocicleta para la venta del gas, ya que lo realiza a domicilio. Este le permitirá aumentar las ventas y así mejorar los ingresos con ellos brindarle a los hijos una mejor calidad de vida y educación.
Su sueño es poder mejorar su vivienda con las ganancias que genere la venta.
texts.en:
José sells ice and gas. He lives in his own house with his wife and his mother. He has two children, ages 5 and 14. He has had this business for a long time.

He will invest the loan that he needs in the purchase of a motorcycle for selling gas, since he does this in customers' homes. This will allow him to increase his sales and thus improve the income with which he offers his children a better quality of life and an education.

His dream is to be able to improve his home with the earnings that his sales generate.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to sell gas

loans.name: Soeun

texts.en:
Soeun, 35, is a resident from Kror Kor district of Pursat province. She has three children, two of whom still count on her as they are still students in the local state school. She struggles to earn a living via her rice farming. Soeun has been involved in her current business for ages, generating about 23,700 KHR per day. To earn extra income, her husband decided to migrate as a paid-worker working in Thailand.  

This cycle is a second cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for Soeun. She has wisely used her past loan support her business and supply the needs of the family. Now she is requesting loan amount is 2,000,000 KHR. She will use her loan amount to build a new house for her family. She hopes to own a proper house with a good condition so that she does not need to worry during either the rainy season or dry season.

loans.use: To build a new house for family

loans.name: Elma

texts.en:
Elma is 51 years old and a widow with nine children.

Elma works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like soap, egg, spices, snack foods, soft drinks, and other items.

Elma has borrowed and paid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years, and she also earns an income from buying and selling livestock and farming vegetables.

Elma aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like soap, egg, spices, snack foods, soft drinks, and other items.

loans.name: Im's Group

texts.en:
Im, age 44 and a widow, is a rice grower on a one and a half hectare area. This is her sole source of income. She has been in this business for three years in order to support her daily cost of living, and it has returned her 7,700 KHR per day. 

Im has been a client for four cycles with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and she forms a group of two with a three-time borrower. The past loans that she repaid with success have upgraded her living conditions. Now she is seeking to borrow 1,400,000 KHR, and her joint member is applying for 500,000 KHR. As the group leader, she will use her loan portion to buy pigs for raising for extra income. She hopes this new business will increase her profit to further improve her living.

loans.use: To buy pigs for raising for extra income

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Gloria de 49 años de edad, es ama de casa y madre de cinco hijos, debido a las condiciones económicas que padeció su familia, creó su propio negocio garantizándoles a sus hijos el acceso a la educación y el derecho a una vida digna. 
Se dedica a la venta de comidas rápidas al frente de su residencia, actividad  que aprendió empíricamente y realiza todos los días. 
Con el propósito de continuar con sus ventas, Gloria se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de un carro de comidas rápidas, debido que al que posee actualmente se encuentra en mal estado. Su mayor sueño es tener su propio restaurante y brindarle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Gloria is 49 years old. She is a housewife and the mother of five children. Because of the economic conditions that her family suffered, she created her own business, guaranteeing her children access to an education and the right to a dignified life.

She sells fast food in front of her home, a business that she learned empirically and does every day.

With the goal of continuing with her sales, Gloria is applying for a loan that she will invest in the purchase of a fast food cart, because the one that she has now is in bad condition. Her great dream is to have her own restaurant and offer her family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a fast food cart

loans.name: Sok

texts.en:
Sok, age 26 and married, is a peasant from Kror Kor District of Pursat Province who grows paddy rice on one and a half hectares. To earn extra income, her husband also drives a tricycle motorbike during his spare time. She has three children, one of whom is still in school. Sok is able to generate about 26,000 riels (KHR) per day from the current business that she has been with for 20 years. 

Sok's prior loan was a first loan with Kiva’s partner VisionFund. She has utilized her past loan smartly to support her living in a standard condition, and she was able to buy household materials after offsetting basic needs. Now she is seeking 2,500,000 KHR in order to build a decent house for her family. She hopes to own proper housing conditions to live in, so she does not need to worry during unpredictable weather issues.

loans.use: To build a decent house for her family

loans.name: Dy's Group

texts.en: A mother of seven children living in Sampov Meas district of Pursat Province, Dy is 47 years old and married. She and the rest of the family solely depend on a single agricultural business, rice farming, on a three-hectare area. The current business, which she has been with for 30 years, has returned her about 21,000 KHR per day. Including this cycle, she is a third-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She feels so confident that she can upgrade her living status and support her business on time from the past loan which she received. Now, she leads a group of three to apply for a new loan. As the group leader, she will spend her loan portion to support her child's wedding expenses. She hopes this loan will support her child's wedding on time.

loans.use: To support her child's wedding expenses

loans.name: Rolando Jose

texts.es:
Rolando, 55 años de edad, habitante de la comunidad  El Jazmín, Teustepe, de oficio agricultor padre de 8 hijos. Sus inicios en la siembre fueron desde muy joven trabajado con sus padre para poder comer, él no fue a la escuela pues se dedicó a las labores de siembra sus padres no tenían como, mandarlo a la escuela. Actualmente siembra maíz y frijol, su cosechas las vende en Boaco, cuando no está sembrando viaja a Costa Rica a limpiar finca y cuidar ganado y lo que gana lo invierte en su negocio.
El este requiriendo el crédito para comprar abono, fertilizantes y pago mano de obra para sembrar frijoles. El espera sacar una producción con calidad y altos rendimientos pues sus planes son es lograr ampliar a 5 manzanas de tierra para sembrar maíz y mejorar la crianza de ganado.
texts.en:
Rolando is 55 years old. He lives in the community of El Jazmín, in Teustepe. He is a farmer and the father of eight children. His beginnings in agriculture were when he young working with his father in order to be able to eat. He did not go to school so he dedicated himself to working with crops. His parents did not have the means to send him to school.

He currently sows corn and beans, and he sells his harvested crops in Boaco. When his is not sowing his crops he travels to Costa Rica to clean country houses and look after livestock, and he invests what he earns in his business.

He requires this loan in order to buy compost and fertilizers and pay for labour so he can plant his bean crops. He hopes to produce quality and high-yield crops as he plans to expand to five units of land so he can plant corn and improve livestock breeding.

loans.use: to purchase compost and fertilizers, and pay for labour

loans.name: Khim

texts.en: A widower residing in Takeo province, Khim is 53 years old and the father of four children. Out of his four children, only two kids are under his care as they are still in school. As a single father who raises the children alone, he does rice cropping in a one-hectare area and works at construction sites for extra income. He has engaged in the current business for 33 years. Khim is a first time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). He will spend his loan portion to pay for his son’s tuition fee. His son will enroll in a local university as a freshman majoring in finance and banking. He highly hopes that he can provide financial support for his son’s education on time until graduation so that his son can obtain a good job with a good educational background.

loans.use: To pay for his son’s tuition fee

loans.name: Dúo San Lorenzo El Cubo Group

texts.es: Duo San Lorenzo el Cubo está formado por María Lucila de 36 años quien no tiene hijos ya que es soltera ella se dedica a  la venta de ropa de segunda mano(ropa para dama, niño, caballero, calzado, juguetes) y lo distribuye en su comunidad de fomra ambulante a sus clientes, ella solicita su crédito para invertir en la compra de calzado y variedad de ropa y poder satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes ya que le solicitan calzado porque lo vende a un comodo precio.  su sueño es poder construir su casa en un pequeño terreno que le heredaron sus padres espera que con la ayuda de ustedes ella pueda seguir adelante en su negocio,
texts.en: 36-year-old María Lucila is part of the Dúo San Lorenzo El Cubo group. She has no children as she is single. She makes a living by selling second-hand clothing (clothes for women, children, and men, as well as shoes and toys) in the streets of her community to her customers. She is requesting a loan to invest in purchasing shoes and a variety of clothes in order to satisfy the demand from her customers, who ask for shoes because she sells them at an affordable price. Her dream is to be able to build her own house on a small plot of land she inherited from her parents. She hopes that with your help she will be able to get ahead in her business.

loans.use: to purchase second-hand shoes and clothing to sell

loans.name: Fernando Luuis

texts.es:
Fernando de 31 años de edad, asegura que para salir adelante sólo se requiere de esfuerzo y buenas oportunidades. Desde hace cinco años se dedica a la barbería, oficio que aprendió de forma empírica y se ha constituido en la fuente de ingresos para él y su familia. Su mayor sueño es mejorar su negocio, pues sólo cuenta con una máquina la cual se encuentra en mal estado por desgaste de uso y acondicionar el lugar, ya que no cuenta con las condiciones para la prestación del servicio. Razón por la cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la dicha inversión, debido a que carece de recursos propios. 
Sus hijas de nueve y cuatro años de edad, son su mayor motivación, por lo cual trabaja arduamente a fin de brindarles un mejor futuro, alejadas de toda carencia económica.
texts.en:
Fernando, who is 31, affirms that to advance himself, he only needs effort and good opportunities. For five years he has worked as a barber, a trade that he learned empirically and that has constituted the source of income for him and his family. His greatest dream is to improve his business, since he only has a machine that is in bad condition because of wear and tear, and to outfit his work location, since he doesn't have the conditions to provide service. For this reason, he is applying for a loan for this investment because he lacks his own resources.

His daughters, ages 9 and 4, are his greatest motivation, which is why he works hard with the goal of offering them a better future, removed from any economic shortcomings.

loans.use: to buy a barber's machine and set up a suitable space

loans.name: Liezelda

texts.en:
Liezelda is 36 years old, and married with six children. Three of her children are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Liezelda has a general store business in the Philippines. Liezelda requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items like shampoo, and groceries, etc. to sell in her general store.

Liezelda has been in this business for five years. In the future, Liezelda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo, and groceries, etc. to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is a hardworking entrepreneur with a bakery business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 24,000 through NWTF to purchase flour, sugar, margarine, and other ingredients for her bakery business.

Erlinda has been in this business for 10 years. Erlinda earns additional income from motorcycle transportation.

Erlinda has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar, margarine, and other ingredients for her bakery business.

loans.name: Lucena

texts.en:
Lucena is 60 years old and married with one child.

Lucena works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. in order to purchase more grocery products to sell.

Lucena has been in this business for five years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Lucena aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery products to sell.

loans.name: Lucita

texts.en:
Lucita is 52 years old and married with six children.

Lucita is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Lucita requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Lucita has been raising pigs for five years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF and, more recently, from Kiva to sustain it.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Merelyn

texts.en:
Merelyn is a married woman from Ubay, Bohol. She has seven children. The eldest child is 17, while the youngest is four. 

She is engaged in a fish vending business. She sells fish to customers in her community. She has been selling fish for five years now. She requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to acquire additional capital to purchase more fish for resale. Merelyn works hard to cater for the needs of her children. In the future, Merelyn would like to expand her fish vending business to support her family as well as be able to send her children to school.

loans.use: to acquire additional capital to purchase more fish for resale.

loans.name: Gulfiyya

texts.ru:
Гульфия 41, она вдова, сама воспитывает 18 летнего сына. Вот уже 12 лет как занимается пцицамы. Продает яйца, птенцов, индюшку и гусей. У Гульфии есть планы расширить свой бизнес, она хочет купить маленький цех для инкубаторов и арендовать землю где есть канал с водохранилищем  для того чтобы создать анбар для корма. 
Гульфия трудолюбивая женщина, сама решает все свои проблемы. Сегодня ей для дома нужно купить холодильник и необходимую мебель. Для этого она обратилась за кредитом в сумму 1000 АЗН манатов. Она очень благодарна за поддержку и желание помощи.
texts.en: Gulfiyya is 41 years old, widowed and has an 18 year old son. She has been raising poultry for 12 years. She sells eggs, chicks, turkeys and geese. Gulfiyya has plans to expand her business, she wants to buys a small space with incubators and rent land with a water reservoir and water channel so that she can build a warehouse for storing feed. Gulfiyya is a hardworking woman and solves her problems herself. Currently she needs to buy a refrigerator for her home and also some essential pieces of furniture. She has turned to KIVA for a loan of 1000 AZN manat. She is very grateful for the support and your willingness to help.

loans.use: to buy refrigerator and furniture for her house

loans.name: Shabnam

texts.ru: Шабнам 22 года. Она замужем, но не имеет детей. Шабнам после окончания средней школы поступила в Таджикский Государственный Университет Коммерции. Данное время она является студенткой 4 курса юридического факультета. Она учится заочно. Шабнам является одной из умных студентов, которая учится хорошо и отлично. Ее преподаватели и родители гордятся ею. Она должна оплатить за учебный договор, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 550 долларов США для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Shabnam is 22 years old, married but has no children. After finishing high school she is studying at the Tajik State College of Business. She is currently a fourth year student in the Law Department. Shabnam is attending evening classes and is one of the smartest students with good grades. Her teachers and her parents are proud of her. Shabnam needs to pay tuition, but has no money. She is requesting a loan of 550 US dollars to pay for her education. Shabnam awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To pay for her education at the university

loans.name: Guldasta

texts.ru: Гулдаста трудолюбивая женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми не обходимыми средствами Гулдаста 4 года назад начала свой бизнес скотоводством. Ее сын помогает ей введение бизнеса. Их доход не хватает для улучшения состояние семьи. Ее муж не имеет постоянное место работы. Он попросил Гулдасту купить ему авиабилет, так как он хочет уехать в Российскую Федерацию. Гулдаста не имеет денег для покупки авиабилета. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомон для покупки авиабилета. Этот займ поможет ей отправить мужа в Россию, где он будет зарабатывать деньги и отправлять ей. Таким образом, состояние проживания улучшится.
texts.en: Guldasta is a hard working woman. She is married and has four children. To provide for her family she has started a livestock business four years ago. Her son helps her take care of the animals. Unfortunately, the income from livestock is insufficient to provide for the family. Guldasta's husband has no steady work in Tajikistan. He asked her to buy him an airplane ticket to travel to Russia, where he will look for work. Guldasta is requesting a loan of 3000 somoni to purchase the ticket. This loan will help her husband travel to Russia where he will work and send money back home. This will help improve the life of their family.

loans.use: To buy air ticket for her husband who wants to work in Russia

loans.name: Tuty

texts.ru: Человек с огромным сердцем доброты и прекрасной душой нуждается вашей поддержки. Ее зовут Тути. Ей 50  лет, замужем и имеет 3  детей. Климат ее местожительства весьма благополучный для выращивания сельхоз культур, а также для скотоводства. Более 20  лет она занимается скотоводством. У нее 2 коровы. Дополнительно она занимается вместе с мужем садоводством, то есть выращиванием абрикосов. Она продает молоко своим соседям и соседи очень довольны от полученного натурального молочного продукта. Она хочет расширить бизнес купле продажей скота. Она запрашивает займ на сумму  5000  сомони для покупки скота и сено, чтобы развевать бизнес. С полученного  дохода она собирается обеспечить своих детей хорошим условием проживания. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: A person with a generous heart and wonderful soul really needs your help. Her name is Tuty. She is 50 years old, married and has three children. The climate of her region is good for farming and raising animals. For more then twenty years Tuty has been raising cattle. She has two cows. In addition, she and her husband also have an orchard where they grow apricots. Tuty sells the milk from her cows to her neighbors and they like her fresh diary products. Tuty wants to expand her business and also raise cattle for meat. She is requesting a loan of 5000 somoni to purchase cattle and hay for them. Tuty is planning to use the profits to provide better living conditions for her children. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle and feed

loans.name: Sreyneat's Group

texts.en:
A young 24-year-old mother of three little kids, Sreyneat is a paid rubber tapper at the rubber plantation at Kampong Cham province, where her residential area is, to earn a living. With the five-year engagement in the current occupation, she is able to earn up to 40,000 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day. However, the main challenge for her is the huge expenses related to transportation back and forth to the workplace from her house. To overcome this challenge, she joins a group of two to apply for a new loan as first-time borrowers. 

She is seeking 4,000,000 KHR while her joint member is applying for 2,000,000 KHR. As the group leader, she will use her loan portion to buy a decent motorbike to support her occupation. She hopes that her transportation expenses will be reduced so she can use that money to cater for her children’s needs instead, especially in purchasing good food for her kids.

loans.use: To buy a decent motorbike to support her occupation.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Mastona

texts.ru: Мастона родилась в сельской местности. Она обратилась в нашу организацию в первый раз для покупки скота. Данный бизнес она начала 3 года назад после смерти мужа. Также она занимается выращиванием картошки и ячменя. Картошку она продаёт на рынке, а ячмень использует для откорма скота. Купленный скот она откармливает 4 месяца и продаёт на рынке скота и покупает новый скот. Введение бизнеса ей помогают свекровь и брат мужа. У Мастоны есть двое детей и оба несовершеннолетние и учатся в школе. По её словам данный бизнес идёт ей в пользу и надеется на финансовую поддержку. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки скота. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Mastona was born in a rural area. She has turned to our organization for the first time so that she can purchase cattle. Mastona has started her business three years ago, after her husband passed away. She also grows potatoes and oats. She sells potatoes at the market and uses oats to fatten her meat cattle. Mastona fattens the animals for four months then sells them at the livestock market and purchase new cattle. Her mother-in-law and the brother of her late husband help Mastona run her business. Mastona has two children, who are both underage and are still attending school. Based on her description her business is profitable and she is requesting financial assistance from us. Maston is asking for a loan of 3000 somoni to purchase more cattle. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle for developing her business

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is 48 years old and married with five children, one of whom is in school, Alicia works very hard to provide for them.

Alicia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 21,500 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell like soap, canned goods, eggs, shampoo, etc.

Alicia has been in this business for 12 years.

In the future, Alicia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like soap, canned goods, eggs, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Evelina

texts.en:
Evelina is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a vegetable-vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 18,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) through NWTF to buy more stock of vegetables to sell for her vegetable-vending business.

Evelina has been in this business for 10 years. Evelina earns more income from farming vegetables.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her vegetable-vending and farming businesses.

Evelina has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy more stock of vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Lucita

texts.en:
Lucita is 29 years old and married with three children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Lucita has a fishing business in the Philippines. Lucita requested a 13,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan amount through NWTF to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

Lucita has been in this business for four years. In the future, Lucita would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy is 44 years old and married with nine children.

She earns a living by pig fattening in the Philippines. Daisy is borrowing 23,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Daisy has been pig fattening for 10 years and also earns additional income from food vending and farming rice.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Zaynura

texts.ru: Зайнуре 30 лет. Он замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Дети Зайнаб и Соибджон еще нетрудоспособные. Ее муж Сухроб занимается услугой перевозки пассажиров по городу. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами  6 месяцев назад она начала свой бизнес с куплей продажей детской одежды. Ее эффективность помогает ей быть успешной в новом бизнесе. Дополнительно она занимается шитьем женской одежды. Она продает свой товар на местном рынке и еще не имеет большой круг клиентов, так как бизнес новый. Она должна купить товар для нового сезона, но не имеет достаточного средства для этого. Она запрашивает займ на сумму  1500 долларов США  для покупки товара для нового сезона. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Zaynura is 30 years old, married and is raising two children. Her children Zainab and Sobijon are underage and cannot work. Her husband Suhrob is a taxi shuttle driver in the city. To provide her family with all the necessities Zaynura has started to sell clothing at the market 6 months ago. Her efficiency helps Zaynura succeed in her business. In addition she also  sews women's clothing. Zaynura sells her wares at the local market and doesn't have regular clients yet, as this is a new business. She needs to purchase a batch of clothing for the summer season but has no money for a big purchase. Zaynura is requesting a loan of 1500 US dollar to purchase summer inventory. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy clothes for new season

loans.name: Mastura

texts.ru: Мастура целеустремленная женщина. Ей 28 лет. Она не замужем и живет с родителями и сестрой Мутабар. Мастура очень трудолюбивая женщина и имеет умелые руки. Она продает продукты питания около дома и дополнительно шьет национальные тюбетейки. Она очень аккуратно шьет тюбетейки и поэтому имеет своих постоянных клиентов. Ее клиенты девушки, которые собираются замуж и готовятся к свадьбе, так как таджикские невесты носят тюбетейки. Мастура продает продукты питания, как хлеб, масло, шоколад, яйцо, молочные продукты, колбасные изделия и т.п. Ее сестра Мутабар помогает ей введение бизнеса. Она хочет развевать бизнес, а для этого она должна купить холодильник для молочных продуктов, солнечный зонтик для бизнеса, а также бисер, нитка и т.п. для шитья тюбетейки. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1500 долларов США. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Mastura is a goal oriented woman, She is 28 years old. Mastura is single and lives with her parents and her sister Mutabar. Mastura is very hard working and has skilled hands. She sells groceries next to her home and also makes traditional Tajik hats. She puts a lot of care into making the hats and has regular clients. Her clients are brides getting ready for their weddings as Tajik brides wear the traditional hats for the ceremony. Mastura also sells groceries such as bread, butter, chocolate, eggs, dairy and sausages. Her sister Mutabar helps her manage this business. Mastura wants to expand her business but she needs to buy a refrigerator to store dairy products, a sun umbrella for her market stall as well as thread, beads etc. for her hat business. She is requesting a loan of 1500 US dollars and awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy fridge, sun umbrella, thread, needle and beads for business

loans.name: Juraqul

texts.ru: Чуракулу 47 лет, он женат и у него четверо детей. Он со своей семьей живет в Хатлонской области в юго-западной части Таджикистана, а точнее в районе Руми. Старший сын работает за пределами страны. Чуракул запрашивает кредит для покупки швейной машины (модели Yamata) для своей дочери. Он хочет помочь дочьке с начатием бизнеса. Его дочь умеет вышивать национальные платья, и ей необходима новая модернизированная швейная машинка. Чуракул решил обратиться в организацию за получением кредита. В будущем Чуракул планирует отремонтировать свой дом за счет полученного дохода от деятельности дочери.
texts.en: Juraqul is 47 years old, married and has four children. He lives in Hatlon region in southwestern Tajikistan, more precisely in the J.Rumy district. His eldest son works abroad. Juraqul is requesting this loan to purchase a sewing machine (model Yamata) for his daughter. He wants to help his daughter start a sewing business. His daughter can embroider national Tajik dresses and she needs a modern sewing machine with embroidery function for this purpose. Juraqul decided to turn to Kiva for a loan.
