In the future he is planning to use the profits from his daughter's business to repair the family's home.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Michaylo

texts.ru: Михайло работает уже 5 лет таксистом на своей машине. Он перевозит пасажиров в г. Хуст, а также близлежащих небольших населенных пунктах. Часть прибыли идет на ремонт машины, остальное - на содержание семьи. Михайло разведен, от брака осталась одна дочь. После развода Михайло переехал к родителям и сечас помогает им, т.к. они уже старенькие и требуют ухода. Михайло просит предоставить ему кредит на комплексный ремонт своей машины - двигатель, кузов, ходовая.
texts.en: Michaylo has been working as a taxi driver for five year. He transports passengers in Khoost and surrounding villages. Some of his earnings he spends for car maintenance, the rest - to support his family. Michaylo is divorced and has one daughter. After the divorce Michaylo moved back with his parents and supports them as they are old and need care. Michaylo is requesting a loan to perform several large repairs on his vehicle - fixing the engine, chassis and trunk.

loans.use: to repair his taxi cab

loans.name: Imilya

texts.ru:
Имилия торгует женской одеждой и обувью. Благодаря предыдущему кредиту она закупила зимнюю одежду и обувь и смогла получить дополнительную прибыль.

Сейчас Имилия просит предоставить ей кредит для закупки весенней одежды. Она планирует поездку на оптовый рынок в Одессу, где она хочет закупить носки, спортивные костюмы, другую одежду и обувь.

Имилия планирует расширение своего бизнеса, открытие новой торговой точки, где она хочет поставить наемного работника.
texts.en: Imilya sells women's clothing and shoes. Thanks to a previous loan she was able to purchase winter inventory of clothing and shoes and earned additional profits. Now Imilya is requesting a loan to purchase spring inventory. She is planning to purchase the clothing wholesale in Odessa where she will buy socks, track suits and other clothes and shoes. Imilya plans to expand her business, open a second sales location and hire another sales person.

loans.use: to purchase spring season clothing inventory - socks and track suits

loans.name: Roman

texts.ru:
Роман ведет тепличное хозяйство - выращивает ранние овощи на продажу. Предыдущий кредит Рома использовал для закупки удобрений и оплаты рабочим, которые собирали овощи у него в теплицах.

В прошлом году у Романа сильно заболела жена. Ей сделали несколько операций и она не могла помогать Роману в работе. И самому Роману был не легко, т.к. нужно было ухаживать за женой и он уделял меньше времени бизнесу. Сейчас все нормализовалось - все могут работать в обычном режиме.

Роман просит предоставить ему кредит для закупки удобрений. Все остальное у него есть. Роман надеется получить хороший урожай и выгодно его продать.
texts.en: Roman has a greenhouse farm - he grows early vegetables for sale. A previous loan helped Roman purchase fertilizer and pay his workers for harvesting vegetables in his greenhouses. Last year Roman's wife fell very ill. She had a number of surgeries and was not able to help Roman at the farm. Roman himself also had far less time because he was taking care of his wife and not paying as much attention to his business. Now everything is back to normal and everyone works on a regular schedule. Roman is requesting another loan to purchase fertilizer. He has everything else for spring planting. Roman hopes to have a large harvest and sell it profitably.

loans.use: purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Gulizar

texts.ru:
Гюлизар занимается выращиванием овощей на своем участке. Живет с мужем в своем доме. 
Гюлизар выращивает помидоры, огурцы, редис. Занимается этим бизнесом уже пять лет. Раньше Гюлизар с мужем работали в колхозе. Колхоз закрыли и Гюлизар начала заниматься своим бизнесом. 
Гюлизар просит предоставить ей кредит 5,000 гривен для закупки пленки и удобрений. Гюлизар намерена расширять свой бизнес и хочет построить еще одну теплицу.
texts.en: Gulizar grows vegetables on her plot of land. She and her husband own their house. Gulizar grows tomatoes, cucumbers and radishes. She has had her business for five years. In the past Gulizar and her husband worked for the farming co-op. But the co-op closed and Gulizar decided to open her own farming business. She is requesting a loan of 5000 grivn to purchase plastic film for greenhouses and fertilizer. She is determined to expand her business and wants to build another greenhouse on her land.

loans.use: to purchase plastic film and fertilizer

loans.name: Galyna

texts.ru:
Вот уже 20 лет как Галина ведет собственный бизнес. Она торгует искусственными цветами на городском рынке
Галина- вдова и ее бизнес является единственным источником ее дохода. Планы Галины - развивать свой бизнес дальше, увеличивать торговый оборот. Галина просит предоставить ей кредит для закупки товара. Она хочет увеличить ассортимент и привлечь больше покупателей.
texts.en: Galyna had her retail business for twenty years. She sells artificial flowers at the city market. Galyna is a widow and this is her only source of income. In the future Galyna plans to grow her business and increase goods turnover. She is requesting a loan to purchase more inventory. She wants to have more variety of artificial flowers and attract more clients.

loans.use: to purchase inventory fo resale

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to buy fishing nets and other equipment.

Merlinda successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further improve her business.

NWTF is re-listing Merlinda's business profile in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and other equipment.

loans.name: Marifat

texts.ru:
Марифат настоящая мастерица по рукодельно – национальной вышивки. Она оживляет ткань вышивкой и дарит радость его хозяину. Ведь за 35 лет своей деятельности Марифтат успела изучать все тонкости своего дела и воспитать ряд учеников. В связи с возрастом и здоровьем Марифат уже не принимает много и частые заказы на вышивку в тонких вещах. Потому, что Марифат с самого начала своей деятельности привыкла выполнять заказ на высшем уровне. А на сегодняшней день её здоровье не позволяет   ей , как и раньше качественно выполнить в краткий срок десятки вышивки. Естественно Марифат нашла своему мастерству другое применение. Теперь она занимается шитьём «йурма» на платках (руймол), подарочный – сувенирных вещах, специальных сумочках из тканей. Её место деятельности отражает мир  рукодельных  мастериц, открывает и знакомит с историей и культурой таджикского народа. Оно так и называется – "Народное ремесло".
 Марифат профессионал на работе и заботливая в семье. Она  с мужем воспитала и поставила четверых детей на ноги.  Дети создали свою семью, только младший сын живёт вместе с нею. На полученный кредит  Марифат хочет  приобрести ткани и нитки, но на данный момент не имеет нужной суммы. Поэтому обратилась в МДО «Арванд»  за помощью. Заранее благодарит за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en:
Marifat is a master craftsman of Tajik Suzani embroidery. She can bring life to fabric with her embroidery and brings happiness to her client. Since starting her embroidery business 35 years ago Marifat was able to learn all the details of her trade and train a number of students. Due to her age and health Marifat no longer takes many frequent requests for fine embroidery. She has a high expectations for her embroidery work and now her health does not allow her to take tens of orders at once and finish them in a speedy manner. However, Marifat is able to use her skill for other purposes - she now embroiders "yurma" on shawls (ruymol), souvenirs and special fabric bags. Her crafts reflects the world of embroidery masters, opens and teaches one about the history and culture of Tajik people. It is rightfully carries the name "Folk Craft". 

Marifat is a professional at work and a caring mother at home. She and her husband raised four children to adulthood. Her children have now started their own families, only the youngest son still lives with his parents. Marifat is going to use this loan to purchase embroidery floss and fabrics. She otherwise lacks the necessary fund and because of that has turned to "Arvand" for help. She is grateful in advance for support and trust.

loans.use: to purchase of thread and fabrics

loans.name: Bibigul

texts.ru: Бибигуль 46-летняя замужняя женщина, мать троих сыновей. Старшему сыну 24 года и он уже женат, среднему 18 лет, а младшему сыну 6 лет. Бибигуль с мужем, сыновьями и невесткой проживает в городе Кургантюбе на юге Таджикистана. Ее муж занимаетя сельским хозяйством. Старший сын находится на заработках за пределами страны. Бибигуль добрая и трудолюбивая женщина. Она уже 10 лет совместно с мужем ведет сельское хозяйство. Сейчас Бибигуль хочет начать бизнес в сфере животноводства. При дворе ее дома имеется сарай для содержания скота и имеется корм для скота. К тому же скотный рынок находится в 3 км от ее дома. Бибигуль берет кредит для купли и продажи крупно-рогатого скота для своего нового бизнеса.
texts.en: Bibigul is a 46 year old married woman and mother of threes sons. Her eldest son is 24 years old and already married, the middle son is 18 and the youngest is 6. Bibigul lives, together with her husband, sons and daughter-in-law in Qurgan-Tube in southern Tajikistan. Her husband is a farmer while her eldest son works abroad. Bibigul is a kind and hardworking woman. She has been assisting her husband with the farm for ten years. Now Bibigul wants to expand into livestock business. Her house has a cattle barn and they have feed for the animals. The livestock market is only 3 kilometers away from her home. Bibigul is taking out this loan to purchase cattle for starting her new business.

loans.use: to purchase cattle for resale as part of her new business venture

loans.name: Safar

texts.ru: Дом, где живет  Сафар, не отвечает стандартам жилья и он срочно должен отремонтировать свой дом. Ему 48 лет, он женат и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Детям 22, 17 и 12 лет. Сафар вместе семьей живет в отдаленном регионе и очень хочет, чтобы его дом был удобным и новым как у друзей и родственников, которые живут в городе. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми не обходимыми средствами Сафар более 10 лет занимается скотоводством. Он выращивает корову, баран и козы. Он имеет большой опыт по скотоводству и справляется с бизнесом один. Его жена домохозяйка и занимается домашними делами. Дети еще не имеет большой доход. Так как у Сафара нет сбережения для ремонта дома, поэтому он запрашивает займ для покупки строительных материалов, как цемент, древесина и т.п. Сафар и его семья ждут вашу доброту.
texts.en: House where Safar lives no longer meets habitation standards and he has to urgently repair his home. Safar is 48 years old, married and is raising three children. His kids are 22, 17 and 12 years old. Safar lives with his family in a remote regions and wants that his home was comfortable and new like the homes of his friends and relatives who live in the city. To provide his family with all the necessities Safar has been raising livestock for the last ten years. He has cattle, sheep and goats in his herd. Safar has a great deal of experience taking care of animals and takes care fo them by himself. His wife is a home maker and takes care of the household. His children do not have work of their own. Safar has no savings to use for house repairs and he must request a loan to purchase construction materials such as cement and lumber. Safar and his family await your kindness.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as lumber and cement house repairs

loans.name: Kholmurod

texts.ru: Человек с огромным сердцем доброты и прекрасной душой, который живет среди высоких Таджикских гор, нуждается вашей поддержки, так как последние время у него проблемы с финансами. Его зовут  Холмурод. Ему  35 лет, женат и на воспитании имеет 1 ребенка, которому 2 года. Климат его местожительство весьма благополучный для выращивания сельхоз культур, а также для скотоводства. Более 6  лет он занимается скотоводством. Он покупает скот, присматривает несколько месяцев и перепродает на местном рынке по более высокой цене, чем он покупал.  У него большая земля, где он может выращивать сено для скота. Однако, он должен сначала улучшить состояние земли то есть дать минеральные удобрения и стимулировать систему водоснабжения. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 400 долларов США для покупки минерального удобрения, и оплатить другие расходы земли. С полученного  дохода он собирается обеспечить свою семью хорошим условием проживания. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Kholmurod is a man with a generous heart and a wonderful soul, who lives in the high mountains of Tajikistan. He needs your support, since recently he has had financial difficulties. Kholmurod is 35 years old, married and has a two year old child. His region's climate supports both agriculture and livestock. Kholmurod has been raising livestock for six years. He purchases cattle, fattens them for a few months then sells at the local market for a higher price. He has a lot of land where he can grow hay for his animals. However, Kholmurod needs to improve his soil by fertilizing and irrigating it. He is requesting a loan of 400 US dollars to purchase fertilizer and pay for other farming necessities. He plans to use the profits from this improvement to provide his family with better living conditions. Kholmurod awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers and pay for other farming expenses

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.ru: Гулбахор 42-летняя замужняя женщина. У нее четверо детей. Гулбахор живет со своей семьей и с семьей брата в одном доме в районе Хуросон, на юге Таджикистана. Муж и сын Гулбахор в настоящее время живут и работают в России. Сама Гулбахор занимается шитьем национальных женских платьев. Одновременно она планирует заняться новым видом бизнеса. Село, где проживает Гулбахор очень хорошо подходит для скотоводства. У Гулбахор имеется собственный бизнес-план, она вместе с братом хочет начать бизнес в области животноводства. При дворе у нее есть новопостроенный сарай для содержания скота. Цель займа - приобретение четырех голов крупно-рогатого скота с целью откорма и перепродажи.
texts.en: Gulbahor is a 42 year old married woman. She has four children. Gulbahor family shares a house with her brother's family in Khuroson region of southern Tajikistan. Her husband and son are migrant workers in Russia. Gulbahor herself sews national Tajik dresses for sale. She also wants to start another business, as the village where Gulbahor lives has good conditions for raising livestock. Gulbahor has a business plan - she and her brother will start raising cattle for meat sales. There is a newly built barn on their property. Gulbahor is requesting this loan to purchase four cows for her herd.

loans.use: to purchase four cows for resale

loans.name: Jessiere

texts.en:
As a married parent of 3 children, Jessiere works hard to support her family.

She has a business selling ready to wear clothing in the Philippines. She also earns additional income from buying and selling gasoline. Jessiere is borrowing PHP 16000 through NWTF to  purchase additional stocks of ready to wear for her selling ready to wear business.

Jessiere has been sustaining her business activities through her past 10 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money for her to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of ready to wear clothing

loans.name: Roselyn

texts.en:
Roselyn is 38 years old and married with 2 children.

Roselyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to purchase more grocery products to sell.

Roselyn has been in this business for four years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Roselyn aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery products to sell.

loans.name: Abdullo

texts.ru: Абдулло человек, который всегда старается улучшить условию проживания. Ему 50 лет, женат, но не имеет детей. Более 20 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхоз культуры, как ячмень, пшеницу, морковь и т.п. Полученный доход он продает на рынке. Так как у него высококачественный урожай, так и его товары имеют большой спрос. Его жена помогает ему в ведении бизнеса. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами он хочет развевать свой бизнес, а для этого он должен получить больше урожая. Он запрашивает займ на сумму  2000 долларов США, чтобы купить минеральные удобрения. С полученного дохода он будет улучшать условию домохозяйства. Он нуждается и ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Abdullo always tries to improve his living contions. He is 50 years old, married but has no children. For the last twenty years Abdullo has been growing oats, wheat, carrots and other crops. He sells his harvest at the local market where there is a lot of demand for his high quality products. His wife helps him on the farm. To provide for his family Abdullo wants to develop the farming business and to achieve that he needs to collect larger harvests. That is why Abdullo is requesting a loan of 2000 US dollars which he will use to purchase fertilizer. Abdullo is planning to use the profits to improve his household. He needs and waits for your kindness.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer for his land

loans.name: Sharof

texts.ru: Шароф добродушный и целеустремленный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 5 детей. Дети совершеннолетние. Его жена умелая портниха и предоставляет услугу швеи. Он живет далеко от города, в селе, где жители в основном занимаются выращиванием сельхоз культуры и скотоводством. Шароф более 26 лет занимается выращиванием сельхоз культуры, как картофель, морковь и т.п. Полученный доход он продает на рынке. Его сыновья помогают ему в ведении бизнеса. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами он хочет развевать свой бизнес, а для этого он должен получить больше урожая. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 долларов США, чтобы купить минеральные удобрения и семена. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Sharof is a positiva and dedicated man. He is married and has five children. His children are all adults now and his wife is a skilled seamstress and has her own sewing studio. Sharof lives far away from the city where residents mostly grow crops and raise livestock. He himself has been farming for more then 26 years and grows potatoes, carrots and other crops. Sharof sells his harvest at the local market and his sons assist him on the farm. To better provide for his family Sharof needs to expand his business and that means collecting larger harvests. He is requesting a loan of 3000 US dollars to purchase fertilizer and seed for planting. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizer and seeds

loans.name: 1Ero Noviembre Group

texts.es:
El grupo 1ero de noviembre, se encuentra ubicado en la comunidad de Tres Valles, en esta región mucha gente se dedica a la siembra y cultivo de piña y caña de azúcar, las principal fuente de empleo es el campo. Aquí existe un grupo integrado 10 personas, cada una de ellas desarrolla una actividad económica con el objetivo de brindar a sus familias una mejor calidad de vida.

Rubicela es uno de los integrantes de este grupo, ella tiene la edad de 50 años, solo estudio primaria y esta casada con Baldemar, ella tiene una hija de nombre Iris que estudia la primaria. 

Rubicela platica que siempre le a gustado la cocina y le platico a su esposo que quería trabajar para ayudarlo con el gasto de su hogar, asi que con el apoyo de el inicio a vender antojitos mexicanos en su hogar los fines de semana(viernes, sábado y domingo), ella ya tiene 7 años realizando esta actividad y dice que sin tener que hacer promoción a su venta los clientes llegan hacerle el gasto, ella también se dedica a la venta de productos naturistas estas ventas las realiza casa por casa, sale a ofrecer sus productos en sus tiempo libres.

Ella invertirá este crédito en le compra de variedad de carne, chiles, tomates, cebolla, aceite, tortillas, frijol, papas, plátanos, maíz, gas, refrescos y medicamentos naturistas.

Ella espera que su negocio continué progresando y construir un pequeño corredor para ahí realizar sus ventas. 
""Gracias a Visionfund por su apoyo, siganle echando ganas para que así como a mi, puedan apoyar mas gente"

Los demas integrantes del grupo son:
andrea simebre de caña,
Jorge Alejandro siembra de caña,
Maria Concepcion taller de laminación y pintura,
Gabriela venta de cosmeticos y manualidades, 
Leticia venta de antojitos, 
Ivett del Carmen venta de perfumes, 
Rufina venta de abarrotes,
Abraham venta de productos de bellesa y estetica,
Ciria venta de zapatos.
texts.en:
The "1ero de noviembre" group is in the Tres Valles community.  Many people make a living sowing and growing pineapple and sugar cane in this region and the main source of income comes from working in the field.  This group is made of 10 members, each of whom is working with the aim of providing their families with a better quality of life.

Rubicela is one member of the group.  She is 50 years old and was only able to complete primary school.  She is married to Baldemar and she has one daughter, Iris, who is in primary school.

Rubicela tells us that she has always enjoyed cooking and, one day when she was talking to her husband, she said she wanted to work to help with household costs.  So, with his support, Rubicela began selling Mexican snack foods out of the home on weekends (Fridays, Saturdays and Sundays).  She now has seven years experience in this. She says that she did not have to do any promotional work and customers just came to buy her products.  Rubicela also sells natural products door-to-door in her free time.

Rubicela will invest this loan in buying meat, chilies, tomatoes, onion, oil, tortillas, beans, potatoes, bananas, corn, gas, soft drinks and natural medicines.

She hopes that her business will continue to progress and that she will be able to build a small hall to sell her foods there.
"Thank you, Visionfund, for your support.  Keep doing your best so that, as you did with me, you can support more people."

The other members of the group are:

Andrea - growing sugar cane
Jorge Alejandro - growing sugar cane
Maria Concepcion - laminating and painting workshop
Gabriela - selling make-up and handicrafts
Leticia - selling snacks
Ivett del Carmen - selling perfumes
Rufina - selling groceries
Abraham - selling beauty products
Ciria - selling shoes.

loans.use: to buy meat, chilies, tomatoes, onion, oil, tortillas, beans, potatoes, bananas, corn, gas, soft drinks and natural medicines.

loans.name: Bacilia Esperanza

texts.es:
Bacilia es una mujer de 40 años de edad luchadora con un grado de escolaridad de primaria completo y junto a su esposo y sus 4 hijos se han podido superar gracias a la dedicación en la actividad del cultivo de hortalizas (papa, brócoli y coliflor). Ella tiene mucha experiencia en esta actividad ya que aprendió hace mas de 25 años esta actividad dirigida e inculcada por sus padres la cual hasta hoy en día siguen ejerciendo. Este es el único medio de ingreso para su familia en la actualidad por medio del cual se han superado y han podido salir adelante. La propiedad que ellos trabajan es propia gracias al esfuerzo y dedicación impuesto por ella y su esposo durante muchos años de trabajo y dedicación la cual está ubicada a a pocos metros de su casa de habitación. Hoy en día Bacilia junto a su esposo trabajan duro para que sus hijos no dejen de estudiar y tengan un mejor futuro, un mejor estilo de vida y tengan mejores oportunidades en la vida. Su producto es comercializado a través de intermediarios que llegan a la zona, vecinos y ellos mismos que viajan hasta la zona de comercio para su venta.

Actualmente maría solicita ayuda para poder invertir en la siembra de papa comprando fertilizantes, abono, y bombas para fumigación a sus cultivos para que ayude a mantenerlo sano y limpio de plagas.

Su sueño es poder mejorar su vivienda, ser una productora de papa en cantidades mayores y ser la mejor de la zona en su producción; pero la prioridad de ella es ver a sus hijos convertidos en profesionales teniendo una mejor educación y a sí mismo un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Bacilia is 40 years old.  She is a plucky woman who completed primary school.  Together with her husband and children, they have overcome problems thanks to their dedication to growing vegetables (potatoes, broccoli and cauliflower).  Bacilia has a lot of experience with this work as she learned the trade from her parents 25 years ago and has been doing it ever since.  This is currently the family's only source of income and it has helped them to overcome problems and to move forward in life.  The family owns the work they land, thanks to Bacilia and her husband's effort and dedication over the years.  The land is only a few metres from their home.  Bacilia works hard alongside her husband so that their children do not leave their studies and so that they have a better future and better opportunities in life.  Bacilia sells her products through intermediaries who come to the area, as well as to neighbours and they even travel to commercial areas to sell their products.

Bacilia is currently applying for help to invest in the potato crops by buying fertliser, manure and fumigation pumps for them.  This will help keep them healthy and free from plagues.

Bacilia's dream is to improve her home, to grow potatoes in bulk and to be the best grower in the area.  However, her priority is to see her children become professionals, with a better education and thus a better future.

loans.use: to buy fertliser, manure and fumigation pumps for her crops.

loans.name: Liezel

texts.en:
Liezel is 33 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by pig fattening in the Philippines. Liezel is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy additional pigs to raise and a sack of feed for her pigs.

Liezel has been pig fattening for three years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional pigs to raise and a sack of feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Banco Mujer Búlwak Group

texts.es:
Enidia es la presidenta de Banco Mujer Bulwak, un grupo con una amplia trayectoria y más de 6 años de haberse fomado. Con ella están en el grupo 3 socias que van a invertir en actividades comerciales y agropecuarias. 
Doña Enidia tiene 31 años de edad, y es madre de 4 hijos, 3 estudiantes de secundaria y 1 más en primaria. Vive en unión libre hace mas de 15 años, y su compañero tiene una pequeña finca donde cultiva plátano, esta la única fuente de ingresos económicos al hogar. Es por eso que Enidia decidió iniciar con su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes en su casa, el primer préstamo le  permitió invertir acondicionar mejor donde tiene y exhibe  los productos, y este segundo préstamo desea invertir en más mercadería, como abarrotes, refrescos, productos de limpieza y otros para su pulpería. 
Sus  aspiraciones son muchas, y los deseos de apoyar la economía familiar, así como ayudar con los estudios de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Enidia is the president of the "Mujer Bulwak" bank, a group that has come along a long path after being created six years ago. There are three other members in the group with Enidia and they will invest in their businesses and in farming work.

Enidia is 31 years old and mother to four children - three are in secondary school and the last is in primary school.  Enidia has been with her partner for over fifteen years - he has a small farm where he grows bananas, the only source of income for the family.  Because it was the only source of income, Enidia decided to start her own business, selling groceries from their home.  Her first loan let her invest to adapting her living space for displaying the products and this second loan with be used to invest in buying merchandise, such as groceries, soft drinks, cleaning products and more, for the shop.

Enidia has many dreams and desires.  She wants to support the family financially and help her children with their studies.

loans.use: to buy groceries for a small store.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is an industrious mother of two children and is engaged in the hog-fattening business. She is 39 years old, and has been in this occupation for three years now. She is inspired to provide all her family's needs, especially the educational needs of her children because she wants to see them become a degree holder someday. 

Marilou is requesting a loan amount of  PHP 10,000 to buy feed and vitamins for her hogs as well as two extra hogs to raise. She hopes through this she can develop their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her hogs as well as two extra hogs to raise.

loans.name: Sirozhiddin

texts.ru: Сирожиддин целеустремленный и жизнерадостный человек. Ему 23 года, он женат и на воспитании имеет 5 детей. Более 5 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхоз культуры, как хлопок, горох, морковь  и т.п. Он очень любит свою работу и упорно трудится с утра до вечера на 1.2 га земли. Его отец и брат помогают ему введение бизнеса. Полученный доход он продает на рынке. Полученный доход он использует для улучшения условия проживания, то есть покупки продуктов питания, одежды и т.п. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 долларов США, чтобы купить минеральные удобрения и топлива. Доход, который он будет получать от бизнеса, будет использовать для образования своих детей и улучшения условия жизни. Он нуждается и ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Sirozhiddin is a purposeful and cheerful person. He is 23 years old, married, and raising 5 children. For over 5 years, Sirozhiddin has been cultivating crops such as cotton, peas, carrots, etc. He loves his occupation and works hard from morning until evening on his 1.2 hectares of land. His father and brother help with the business. Sirozhiddin sells his harvest at the market and uses his profits to improve his family's living conditions by buying food, clothing and so on.

Sirozhiddin is requesting a loan of US$1000 to purchase mineral fertilizers and fuel. He will use his business profits to pay for his children's education and improve their lives. Sirozhiddin is in need and is counting on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and fuel for his farm

loans.name: Esboy

texts.ru: Эшбой трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 5 детей. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами 7 лет назад он начал свой бизнес выращиванием сельхоз культур. Он выращивает зерновые культуры. Он очень любит свою работу, и год за годом развевает бизнес. Дополнительно он занимается скотоводством. Его сыновья помогают ему введение бизнеса. Этот бизнес источник дохода семьи, так как его жена пенсионерка и получает маленькую пенсию. Эшбой хочет сделать посев, но не имеет денег для покупки семена и минерального удобрения. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 долларов США. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Esboy is a hard-working and kind person. He is married and raising 5 children. In order to provide his family with all necessities of life, 7 years ago Esboy started his farming business and presently cultivates grains. He loves his work and develops his business with each passing year. Esboy also raises livestock. His sons help their father with his business, which represents the family's main source of income as Esboy's retired wife only receives a small pension.

Esboy is ready for sowing but lacks the means to purchase seeds and mineral fertilizers. He is requesting a loan of US$1000 and counting on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers for his farm

loans.name: Hamisi

texts.en:
Hamisi appreciates the previous Kiva loan, which helped him to boost his business. For the past five years, he has operated a green grocery business, selling at retail to his neighbors and passersby. He faces the major challenge of high transportation costs in his business. Hamisi dreams of expanding his business and earning more profits to educate his children in the future.

With the loan, he wants to purchase sacks of tomatoes, onions, bananas, green vegetables and onions for business. He joined Yehu to access loans to improve his living standards.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of tomatoes, onions, bananas, green vegetables and onions

loans.name: Nury Estella

texts.es:
Nury Estella de 39 años de edad, se dedica desde hace 15 años a prestar su servicio de belleza consistente en el corte de cabello, tintura y cepillado en un local cerca de su vivienda y en el cual trabaja todos los días desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m. Actividad que se ha convertido en la única  fuente de ingresos para el sostenimiento de su núcleo familiar. 
Cuenta que inició con la actividad gracias a clases gratuitas que le dieron  en su barrio y luego comenzó a laborar en diferentes salones de belleza, hasta que decidió independizarse. Hoy se encuentra adecuando un pequeño local debido a que el negocio lo tenía en su residencia, pero su clientela ha ido aumentando, lo que generó la necesidad de un nuevo espacio. Debido a esto se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en adecuaciones locativas (pintura para la fachada, baño y cielorraso)
texts.en:
Nury Estella is 39 years old and for fifteen years has made a living as a hairdresser, cutting, dying and styling hair in a premises near her home in which she works every day from 9:00am to 8:00pm. This activity is her sole source of income to support her family.
She explains that she began this job thanks to free classes which were given in her neighborhood. She then started working in different beauty salons, until she decided to become independent. 
Today, she is setting up a small premises, because previously, her business was located in her home, but she has been getting more and more customers and so she needed a new space. For this reason, she is requesting a loan to invest in making improvements to her business premises by buying paint for the salon front,bathroom and ceiling.

loans.use: to make improvements to her business premises (paint for the front of the salon, bathroom and ceiling)

loans.name: Ana Gladys

texts.es:
Ana, solicita un nuevo préstamo por la necesidad de invertir más en la productividad de pupusas y refrescos, ya que esta es la actividad a la que se dedica. Este le permitirá comprar aceite, tomates, quesillo, carne, entre otros.
El crédito anterior le ayudo a incrementar sus utilidades y las invirtió en los gastos del hogar. Las circunstancias familiares han mejorado, asimismo las condiciones económicas, ya que logro fortalecer su negocio con el préstamo otorgado por Kiva.
texts.en:
Ana is requesting another loan because she needs to invest more in her business selling pupusas, a traditional El Salvadorian thick corn tortilla, and soft drinks. With this loan, she will be able to buy oil, cheese, meat and other ingredients.
Her previous loan enabled her to boost her profits and she used these to pay household expenses. The circumstances of her family have improved, as has their economic situation, because Ana was able to strengthen her business with the loan from Kiva.

loans.use: to buy oil, tomatoes, cheese, meat and other ingredients.

loans.name: Thy's Group

texts.en:
Thy, a local resident from Moung Russey district of Battambang province, is 53 years old and a widow with five children. As a single mother who is the head of the family, she does rice cultivation on a three hectare area. She has engaged in the current business for 33 years and is able to earn up to 10,000 KHR per day. 

This is not the first loan for Thy with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). The past loan has enabled her to support her business at a good pace and has returned a decent income for her family’s sake. She is now in a group of two to apply for a new loan. She is seeking 1,000,000 KHR, and her joint member is applying for 400,000 KHR. 

As the group leader, she will use her loan portion to pay plowing fees and to buy rice seeds. She hopes to grow her rice on time and gain high yield with double profit, so that she can support her living and expand her business in a bigger scale.

loans.use: to pay for plowing fees and to buy rice seeds.

loans.name: Marlon

texts.en:
Marlon is 38 years old, married and has three children. Marlon is a farmer and has been raising crops, primarily planting and harvesting rice to sell, for over 10 years now. He earns PHP 20,000 during harvest season (twice a year). He aims to improve the growth of his crops, which is why he is asking for a loan of PHP 40,000 to buy fertilizers and pesticides and pay laborers who help him in the farming business. He needs additional laborers because he is not able to do all farming activities such as sowing, tilling, planting and harvesting crops. 

In the future, Marlon hopes to achieve plenty of crops to harvest in order to save funds for his children's education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides and pay laborers who help him in the farming business.

loans.name: Diosdado

texts.en:
Being the head of the family, there is no difficulty in taking action with responsibility even if you know that it is hard to do. According to Diosdado, he is doing his best just to feed his family and give them a better way of living. Diosdado has a less fortunate family, that’s why he is working hard to maintain his family's needs.

Diosdado is 52 years of age, married and has three children. Aside from farming, Diosdado manages a hog raising business in their village. He dreams of growing this livestock business for a continuous source of income. Diosdado is asking for a loan of PHP 37,000 to buy feed and vaccines for his hogs' maintenance. He hopes that his dream becomes a reality.

loans.use: to buy feed and vaccines for his hogs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wood, foam, glue, and other items.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
As a married mother of four children, Marilyn works hard to support her family.

She has had a fishing business in the Philippines for the past 28 years. Marilyn is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy fishing net and other equipment for her fishing business.

Marilyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past nine loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to send her children to college and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing net and other equipment.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase irrigation equipment

loans.name: Dúo Huerto Del Eden Group

texts.es:
DUO HUERTO DEL EDEN
Doña Aura Roselia es originaria de Tecpan, tiene 26 años de edad bajo su responsabilidad están sus dos hijos menores de edad que necesitan el cuidado de ella, ella se dedica  a la venta de ropa nueva en el mercado municipal de Tecpan.
Desde hace algunos años ella ha venido realizando su actividad ya que es el medio que ha tenido para salir adelante con su familia. 
El esposo trabaja como jornalero y gracias al apoyo de el ella sigue adelante con su  negocio.
El sueño de ella es tener un negocio mas grande, tener su propio local surtir con mas variedad de productos ya que asi obtendrá mejores ganancias y poder mandar a sus hijos a la escuela para un futuro mejor. ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de ropa nueva para la venta.
texts.en:
Aura Roselia is originally from Tecpan, and is 26 years old. She has two young children who need her care, and she works selling new clothing in the Tecpan town market.
She has made a living in this way for several years, which has helped to to support her family. Her husband works as a laborer and thanks to his support she continues to advance with her business.
Her dream is to have a bigger business, and to have her own store stocked with a wider variety of products in order to make higher profits and be able to send her children to school so they can have a better future. She is requesting this loan to buy new clothing to sell.

loans.use: to buy new clothing to sell.

loans.name: Andres

texts.en:
Andres is in his 60s, married and has 11 children. Through farming corn in their village, Andres supports his family's necessities. When his children started attending school, Andres thought about another source of income that would help him in financing his children's needs in school. Andres started a livestock business, which he still manages today.

Andres wants to continue operating the business as long as he can manage it. He is requesting a loan of PHP 42,000 to buy piglets to raise and feed for maintenance. He knows that he is getting older and he needs to earn a profit and save some of it for his family's future emergencies.

loans.use: to buy piglets and feed

loans.name: Ny's Group

texts.en: Ny, originally from Battambang province, is 34 years old and blessed with four little kids. His family mainly depends on growing corn on one hectare of land, with which he is able to earn about 21,900 Riel per day. This is the only business that he has been involved with for six years. This is the first micro loan for Ny with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). He formed a group of two to apply for a new loan. He, the group leader, is seeking 1,000,000 KHR and his fellow group member is applying for 650,000 KHR. Ny will spend his loan portion to plow his farmland and to buy potash, seeds, and insecticide. He hopes to receive multiple yields that are better than before so he can set aside some money to be ready to cover the school expenses for his four kids when they enroll in school..

loans.use: To plow his farmland and to buy potash, seeds, and insecticide

loans.name: Boniface

texts.en:
Boniface is married and has two children. They reside in Nkubu, Eastern Kenya. He has been a farmer for five years.

He has requested a loan from Juhudi Kilimo of KES.40,000 for the purchase of a generator. This will enable him to bring proper lighting to his farm, especially in times of electricity shortage. He says that the use of this loan and the output of it will help him educate his children .He plans to buy a larger piece of land. He says that Juhudi Kilimo is the best.

loans.use: To purchase a generator

loans.name: Oroberesoromandi Group

texts.fr:
Mme SAFIORA représente le groupe OROBERESOROMANDI. Mariée, elle est mère de 05enfants. Le plus âgé a30ans et le moins âgé a 18ans. 01 va à l’école. Elle a 03personnes en charge.
Mme fait la poterie depuis 40ans. Elle s’approvisionne par livraison à domicile. Ses clients sont les vendeurs en gros et détails.
Elle veut s’acheter 20charettes d’argile.
Mme veut réinvestir ses bénéfices dans son activité. Elle ambitionne améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille ( la scolarité des enfants).
texts.en:
Mrs. SAFIORA is the representative of OROBERESOROMANDI Group. She's married and the mother of five children. The eldest is 30 years old, the youngest is 18. One of them attends school. She also has three dependents.

Mrs. SAFIORA has been a potter for 40 years. She gets her supplies delivered to her home. Her clients are wholesalers and retailers.  

She wants to buy 20 cartloads of clay. She will reinvest her profits in her business. She ambitions to improve the standard of living of her family and ensure her children's education.

loans.use: to buy 20 cartloads of clay

loans.name: Kuevi

texts.fr: Kuevi est âgé de 46ans. Marié à une revendeuse et père de famille, pasteur de profession, il exerce en même temps une seconde activité lui permettra de joindre les deux bouts. Il vend des jus à domicile et sollicite son second crédit pour acheter des éléments entrant dans la préparation du jus et un nouveau congélateur. Il espère réinvestir dans l’activité et assurer une bonne éducation à ses enfants.
texts.en:
Kuevi, age 46, is married to a reseller and the father of a family. He's a trained pastor. In parallel, he runs a secondary business to make ends meet: he sells fruit juices at home.

He's seeking a second loan to buy ingredients required to prepare juices and a new freezer. He hopes to reinvest his profits in his business and ensure his children get a good education.

loans.use: to buy a freezer and ingredients to prepare fruit juices

loans.name: Adjoavi

texts.fr: Adjoavi est une femme âgé(e) de 43 ans. Elle est mariée à un revendeur et mère de famille. Adjoavi travaille comme revendeuse d’alimentation générale depuis 1995. Elle revend au marché et achète à Lomé. Adjoavi a requis son quatrième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter plus de marchandises (riz, tomates, huile végétale) pour mieux répondre à la demande de ses clients. Elle veut réinvestir en louant une boutique et assurer un avenir radieux à sa famille.
texts.en: Adjoavi is a 43-year-old woman. She is married to a merchant and is a mother. She has been selling grocery products since 1995. She sells her products at the market and gets her supplies in Lomé. Adjoavi has requested her 4th loan from WAGES in order to buy more merchandise (rice, tomatoes, vegetable oil) so that she can better respond to her customer demand. She would like to reinvest in her business by renting shop space and ensure a bright future for her family.

loans.use: to buy food staples.

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann works hard to support her family. Mary Ann is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Mary Ann requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks for her food vending business.

Mary Ann has been in this business for four years now.

In the future, Mary Ann would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks for her food vending business

loans.name: Abla

texts.fr: Femme de 52ans, Abla vit avec ses 06 enfants à Lomé. Elle exerce comme activité génératrice de revenus la vente des produits de beauté et divers au marché. Manquant de fonds pour mieux satisfaire aux besoins des clients, Abla sollicite son second crédit à WAGES pour acheter des produits de beauté. Elle espère aménager sa boutique avec le profit réalisé et avoir une famille épanouie.
texts.en:
Abla is a 52-year-old woman who lives with her six children in Lome. Her income-generating activity consists in selling cosmetics and various beauty products at the market.

Lacking funds to better meet customer needs, Abla is requesting her second credit loan from WAGES to buy beauty products.

She will use the profits to make improvements to her shop and ensure her family's well-being.

loans.use: cosmetics and various beauty products

loans.name: Dominga

texts.en:
Dominga is a 37-year-old married woman and a mother of four children from San Miguel, Bohol. 

She runs a sari-sari or variety store business selling various goods and items to the people in her area. 

Dominga is asking for a loan to buy additional materials to sell, like canned goods, candies, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries. With this, she will be able to attract more buyers to her store, thus augmenting her sales and income. 

In the future, Dominga hopes to expand her store and make it a success.

loans.use: to buy additional materials to sell, like canned goods, candies, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries

loans.name: Paulina

texts.en:
Paulina is a 42-year-old  married woman from Ubay,Bohol. She has six children. The oldest child is 23, while the youngest is eight. 

She owns and operates a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells items, such as noodles, canned goods, seasonings, soft drinks and  beverages. She requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to buy additional stocks, like canned goods, dry goods and soft drinks to cater to the needs of her customers. 

She hopes that some day she will be successful in her retail business and be able to improve their livelihood and also send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks, like canned goods, dry goods and soft drinks

loans.name: Myrene

texts.en:
Myrene is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy a new engine for her fishing boat.

Myrene successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

NWTF is re-listing Myrene's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy a new engine for her fishing boat.

loans.name: Modoukpe

texts.fr: Épouse de soudeur à Lomé, Modoukpè achète des produits cosmétiques qu’elle revend dans sa boutique. Âgée de 28 ans elle est mère d’un enfant de 07 ans scolarisé. Elle sollicite son quatrième crédit auprès de notre institution(WAGES) pour l’agrandissement de son stock et la revalorisation de son seule activité génératrice de revenu. Elle compte ouvrir une seconde boutique et pouvoir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Modoukpè is the wife of a welder in Lomé. She buys cosmetics she then resells in her shop. She is 28 years old and the mother of a seven-year-old child who attends school.

She is requesting a fourth loan from our institution (WAGES) to expand her stock and enhance her only income-generating activity.

She plans to open a second shop and support her family's needs.

loans.use: buy cosmetics to sell in her shop

loans.name: Sophal's Group

texts.en:
Sophal, 56, is a local farmer from the Bovel district of Battambang province and a widow. 

She earns a living through one and half hectares of corn cropping. The 11 year engagement in the current business earns her about 26,700 KHR per day. 

Having never been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) before, Sophal is a leader of a group consisting of two female members. 

She is seeking a loan for ploughing fees and to buy rice seed, fertilizer and insecticide for her farmland. 

She has high expectations of a high yield from her current business and hopes to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy rice seed, fertilizer and insecticide for her farmland

loans.name: Rosa Amelia

texts.es:
Rosa de 27 años, es una mujer campesina dedicada a la agricultura desde su infancia. 
En la actualidad se dedica al cultivo de ají, actividad que aprendió gracias a sus padres quienes se dedicaron al mismo oficio. 
Su cultivo se ha convertido en su única fuente de ingresos, mediante el cual su familia goza de mejores oportunidades de vida y sus dos hijos de una mejor educación.
Sueña con convertirse en una microempresaria por lo cual desea expandir sus cultivos, razón por la cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de semillas y abonos, que le permitirán sacar una cosecha de mejor calidad obteniendo mejores ganancias y mejorando la calidad de vida de suhogar.
texts.en:
Rosa, 27, is a farmer who has been involved in agriculture since her childhood.  Currently, she grows peppers, which she learned to do thanks to her parents who were in the same business.

Her farm activity has become her only source of income and, because of it, her family enjoys better opportunities in life and her two children have a better education.

Her dream is to become a small business owner and expand her range of crops.  Therefore, she is requesting a loan to buy seeds and fertilizers that will allow her to improve the quality of her harvest so she can earn more and improve her family's lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Shalom Group

texts.es: El grupo “SHALOM”  está conformado por 8 mujeres trabajadoras dedicadas a diversas actividades del comercio minorista. Eliana tiene 26 años conviviente  con un hijo. Dedicada a la venta de carne en el mercado ex Ramón Castilla. Hace 4 años viene realizando esta actividad. Ella decidió emprender este negocio YA  que desde muy jovencita ayudo a sus padres  en el negocio de carnicería. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de más carne. Su mayor deseo es tener su casa propia. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo. Eliana es la primera del lado izquierdo. Olga no esta presente en la foto por motivos de salud.
texts.en:
The communal bank "SHALOM" is comprised of eight working women who are involved in different retail businesses.  Eliana, 26, lives with her common-law husband and son.  She sells meat at the Ramón Castilla Market and has been in business for four years.  She decided to set up her business as she had learned about the meat business from her parents by helping them when she was young.

She will use the loan to buy more meat.  Her greatest desire is to have her own home.  She is grateful to KIVA lenders for the loan.  Eliana is the first one from the left.  Olga is not in the photo for health reasons.

loans.use: To buy meat.

loans.name: Komla

texts.fr: Jeune homme de 27ans, Komla est couturier/brodeur de profession. A la fin de son apprentissage, il a ouvert son atelier en 2010 dans lequel il coud les habits à ses clients. Il espère acheter de la machine à coudre et aménager son atelier avec le premier crédit qu’il sollicite à WAGES. A l’avenir, il espère revendre du bazins et avoir un grand atelier.
texts.en:
Komla is a young 27-year-old man who is a professional tailor and embroiderer. Following his apprenticeship, he opened his workshop in 2010 in which he sews clothes for his customers.

With this first credit loan requested from WAGES he hopes to buy a sewing machine and make improvements to his workshop.

In the future, he hopes to resell bazin fabric (type of colorful West-African fabric) and set up a large workshop.

loans.use: Buy a sewing machine and embroidery

loans.name: Kanlé

texts.fr: Kanlé est une jeune dame de 25ans. Femme au foyer et maman d’un enfant de 03ans scolarisé, Kanlé est tresseuse et revendeuse de ferrailles depuis 2007 à domicile. Aidée par une personne,  elle sollicite un troisième crédit pour acheter des ferrailles. A l’avenir, elle espère ouvrir d’autres points de vente et contribuer au développement de la famille.
texts.en:
Kanlé is a young 25-year-old lady, housewife and mother of a three-year-old child enrolled in school,

Since 2007, Kanlé braids hair and resells scrap metal from her home. Helped by one person, she is requesting a third loan to buy scrap metal.

In the future she hopes to open more sales outlets and contribute to her family's development.

loans.use: buy scrap metal

loans.name: Fatou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe composé de 9 femmes habitant le même village et pratiquant toutes du commerce vivent en harmonie. La plus part d'elles est a son 24 ème prêt.
Fatou est  la représentante du groupe, elle est debout au milieu de la photo et porte un grand boubou bleu avec une écharpe blanche. elle est âgée de 57 ans elle est marié et mère de six enfants dont deux filles.
Elle achète des tissus en gros pour les revendre en détail dans sa boutique qui se trouve chez elle.Elle a  une bonne expérience dans ce domaine.Son activité marche bien dans la zone, cause pour laquelle elle  n'est plus la seul à le faire. 
Avec ses bénéfices elle aide son marie dans les dépenses de la maison.Elle est même en train de faire la  réfection de sa maison.Elle paie aussi la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This group is made up of 9 women who are all resellers and live together in harmony in the same village. Most of the group members are on their 24th loan.

Fatou is the group representative. She is standing in the middle of the picture, wearing a large blue boubou and a white scarf. She is 57 years old, married and the mother of 6 children, 2 of whom are girls. She buys fabric wholesale and resells it to retail customers in her home shop. She has built up a good experience in this line of work. Her business is working well in her region, and this is why she is no longer the only one with such a business in the area. She uses her profits to support her husband with the household expenses. She is even busy with a house renovation project. She also pays for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy 250 000 francs' worth of fabric and 150 000 francs' worth of woven pagne cloth.

loans.name: Suli Maryori

texts.es:
Suli Maryori de 30 años, es madre de dos hijos  menores de edad, se dedica a la comercialización de ropa en un pequeño almacén que logró montar gracias a años de esfuerzo y dedicación. Gracias al desarrollo de su actividad su familia goza de buenas condiciones de vida. Ama su trabajo y asegura que las ventas son una de sus grandes pasiones. 
Con el fin de reforzar el inventario para el mes de mayo, día de las madres, Suli se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de mercancía. Espera que con dicha inversión pueda mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos. 
Su mayor sueño es ampliar su almacén y convertirse en una fuente generadora de empleo en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Suli Maryori, 30, is the mother of two minor children and she sells clothing out of a small shop she was able to set up through many years of hard work and dedication.  Thanks to how the business has prospered her family has a good lifestyle.  She loves her work and says that selling is one of her great passions.

In order to strengthen her stock for the month of May, for Mother's Day, Suli is requesting a loan to buy merchandise.  She hopes the investment will improve her children's quality of life.

Her dream is to expand her shop and be able to generate employment for her community.

loans.use: To buy merchandise.

loans.name: Rubenia Dolores

texts.es:
Rubenia, se dedica a la venta de variedad de frutas y asimismo comercializa cocos, este lo lleva a cabo de las 8:00 am a 4: 00pm. Ella es madre soltera, disfruta de dos hijos, los cuales tienen edades de 16 y 18 años; no posee ayuda del extranjero. 
El préstamo que requiere  para comprar futas tales como: sandia, melón, manzanas, granadillas, naranjas, uvas, cocos, entre otras para brindarle diferentes frutas a los clientes; este le permitirá incrementar sus ventas y con ello obtener ingresos.
Las circunstancias familiares han cambiado y así las condiciones económicas han mejorado.
texts.en:
Rubenia earns a living selling a variety of fruits and sometimes, coconuts.  She works from 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.  She is a single mother who enjoys her two children, ages 16 and 18, and has no economic help from overseas.

She is in need of a loan to buy fruits such as watermelon, melon, apples, pomegranates, oranges, grapes, and coconuts, etc.  This is so she can offer more variety of fruit to her customers, which will increase sales and income.

Her family circumstances have changed so her economic situation is better.

loans.use: To buy fruits such as watermelon, melon, apples, pomegranates, oranges, grapes, coconuts, etc.

loans.name: Awa's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est composé de 04 femmes qui habitent le même quartier, leur activité principal est le commerce
   Awa est la représentante du groupe elle est âgée de 47 ans mariée et mère de 08 enfants dont 3 filles de 24;15;et 12 ans et 5 garçons de 10;7;5;et 3 ans.C'est elle qui a levé la main dans la photo.
   Elle est restauratrice et vend en même temps des tissus.Son restaurant se trouve a la gare routière.Avec son prêt elle compte acheter en stock tout ce dont elle aura besoin pour la préparation de ses repas( huile de palme, huile végétal,oignon,pomme de terre,sucre etc).Elle est très expérimenté dans le domaine de la restauration.
   Ses bénéfices lui permettent d'épargner dans le banc villageois et d'aider aussi son marie dans les dépenses de la maison.
texts.en:
This group is made up of 4 women who live in the same district and whose main activity is trade. Awa is the group representative. She is 47 years old, married and the mother of 8 children, 3 of whom are girls - aged 24, 15 and 12 - and 5 of whom are boys - aged 10, 7, 5 and 3. She is the woman with her hand raised in the picture.

Awa has a restaurant business and also sells fabrics. Her restaurant is located at the bus station. She plans to use her loan to replenish her inventory with all the ingredients she needs to prepare her meals (palm oil, vegetable oil, onions, potatoes, sugar, etc.). She has a lot of experience in the restaurant business. Her profits enable her to build savings in the "banc villageois"  and also to support her husband with the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy 20 litres of palm oil, 20 litres of vegetable oil, 50 kilos of sugar, 50 kilos of onions and 50 kilos of potatoes.

loans.name: Lida

texts.es:
Lida, de 40 años de edad esta casada con Amador y junto a él tiene 3 hijos de 11, 8 y 2 años de edad respectivamente, vive en su casa propia y comparte sus días con su cónyuge, sus hijos y su suegra compartiendo día a día su lucha por salir adelante. El trabajo de Lida consiste en la venta de bebidas gasificadas de todo tipo, en tamaño, marca y presentación, hace sus pedidos al por mayor, para después venderlos entre los vecinos y algunos ocasionales clientes que pasan por su casa, para cumplir esta función tiene un espacio en su casa donde ha acondicionado diversas sillas y mesas junto a un congelador. Lleva en este negocio 1 año y le va muy bien.Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es el trato directo que tiene con sus clientes, le agrada además compartir esta función con su esposo y eso la motiva a seguir adelante. Espera implementar pronto un pequeño bar para continuar trabajando con mejores resultados.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/ 1800 soles, está muy emocionada y agradecida por el respaldo económico que le ofrecen para continuar con sus planes.
Con el monto solicitado comprará más bebidas gasificadas para así tener más variedad en productos.
texts.en:
Lida, 40, is married to Amador and they have three children, ages 11, 8 and 2.  They live in their own house which they share with her mother-in-law, all working together to get ahead.  Lida sells all kinds of softdrinks for a living and buys her goods wholesale.  She later sells them to her neighbors and to the occasional customer who stops by the house.  There is a space in her house where she has set up tables and chairs next to her refrigerator.  She has been in business for a year and it is going well.  What she enjoys about her work is the direct contact with her customers.  She also enjoys sharing her work with her husband and this motivates her to get ahead.

Lida hopes to be able to set up a small bar soon so she can continue improving her profits.  On this occasion, she is requesting 1,800 PEN.  She is very excited and grateful for the economic support she is receiving to continue with her plans.

The loan will be used to buy more soft drinks so a wider variety will be on offer.

loans.use: To buy soft drinks.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.en:
Sandra is 34 years old and married with six children.

Sandra works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell.

Sandra has been in this business for five years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Sandra aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Kossi

texts.fr: Kossi a 28 ans, il est célibataire. Il exerce la profession de coordonnier depuis plus de 7 ans. Il vend et fabrique des chaussures pour adultes et pour enfants. Il sollicite un crédit auprès de WAGES afin d'acheter les produits nécessaires à la fabrication de chaussures: semelle, colle, lassé.... Il compte réinvestir les profits qu'il fera afin d'agrandir son atelier et, pourquoi pas, en créer un autre. Il espère surtout avoir un revenu lui permettant de fonder une famille et de répondre à ses besoins.
texts.en:
Kossi is a single 28-year-old. He has been working as a shoemaker for more than 7 years. He manufactures and sells shoes for adults and children.

He is requesting a loan from WAGES to buy the necessary shoe-making products: shoe soles, glue, shoe-laces.... He is planning to use his profits to expand his workshop and - possibly - open another one.

He particularly hopes to generate an income that enables him to start a family and meet his own needs.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make shoes.

loans.name: Santos Alexander

texts.es:
Santos tiene 41 años de edad, es casado y tiene dos hijos. Se dedica a cultivar granos básicos y hortalizas desde que tenía 19 años de edad; aprendió este trabajo gracias a su padre. Para comprar los insumos agrícolas que necesita, tiene que viajar en bicicleta durante veinticinco minutos y para trasladar los insumos debe pagar transporte para que se los lleven a su casa.  

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar tres sacos de abono, herbicidas y foliares para su cultivo. Con la inversión cultivara 7,000 metros cuadrados de granos básicos para consumo familiar y para la venta. Él desea con las ganancias comprar más animales para que le produzcan leche y ayudar a sus hijos en todo lo que pueda.
texts.en:
Santos, 41, is married and has two children. He has been growing basic grains and vegetables since he was 19 years old, taught by his father. In order to buy all the agricultural supplies he needs, he has to ride his bicycle for twenty-five minutes and then pay somebody to take them back home.

Santos is requesting a loan to Fundación Campo to buy three bags of compost, herbicides and fertilizer sprays for his plantations. He will cultivate 7,000 square meters with basic grains for his family’s consumption and to sell. With the profits he wants to buy more animals and increase his milk production, and help his children as much as he can.

loans.use: to buy three bags of compost, herbicides and fertilizer sprays for his crops.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is 40 years old and has five children. Susan is married and has two children who are in school.

Susan is in the agricultural business, raising cows in the Philippines. Susan requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her cow.

Susan has been raising cows for 17 years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Susan would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her cow.

loans.name: Lis' Group

texts.en:
A young mother of a little son, Lis is 20 years old. She is from Bovel district of Battambang province, and grows corn in the local area on one hectare of farmland. To supplement the family’s income, her husband also works for others for a fee when he has free time from farming. She has been involved in the agriculture sector for three years, and earns about 28,600 KHR per day. 

Lis has just joined VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for this cycle. She is forming a group of two to apply for a new loan. She is seeking a loan of 1,500,000 KHR and her co-borrower is applying for 1,000,000 KHR. 

As the group leader, she will spend her loan portion on plowing costs, rice seeds, potash, and purchasing insecticides. She hopes that she can grow her crops healthily and make a good income so that she can send her son to school when he is the age for schooling.

loans.use: to pay for plowing costs, to buy rice seeds, potash, and insecticide.

loans.name: Nchombo

texts.en:
Nchombo is a single woman. She owns a house that has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees for her young siblings.

For the past two years, she has operated a business selling Khangas (cloth that women wrap themselves in). She has been selling from door-to-door to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in the sales of clothes.

With the KES 25,000 she wants to purchase bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is 55 years old and has five children. Julieta is married and has three children who are in school.

Julieta is in the agricultural business, fattening pigs in the Philippines. Julieta requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of feed for her pigs.

Julieta has been pig-fattening for nine years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Julieta would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of feeds for her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizer.

loans.name: Dorothy

texts.en:
Dorothy resides in Nkubu, is married and has two children. She has been farming for ten years, producing cash crops.
She has requested a loan from Juhudi Kilimo of KES 30,000 for the purchase of pigs. This will increase her income level and hence improve her standard of living. She wants to have over one thousand pigs. Her major challenge is lack of capital. She appreciates Juhudi Kilimo for fast processing of loans.

loans.use: to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizer.

loans.name: Sababsongo 2 Group

texts.fr:
Mme WOUGO MARGUERITE représente le groupe SABABSONGO 2. Mariée, elle est mère de 09enfants. Le plus âgé a27ans et le moins âgé a 1an. 08 vont à l’école. 
Mme vend des tubercules et fruits depuis 11ans. Elle s’approvisionne en Côte d’Ivoire et au Ghana. Ses clients sont les hommes, les femmes et les enfants.
Elle veut s’acheter 07 cartons de mangues.
Mme veut épargner ses bénéfices. Elle ambitionne ouvrir un magasin de stockage de tubercules et fruits et mieux s’occuper de la scolarité des enfants.
texts.en: Ms. Wougo Marguerite represents the Sababsongo 2 Group. She is married and mother of nine children. The oldest is 27-years old and the youngest is less than 1-year old.  Eight attend school.  For 11 years, Wougo Marguerite has sold tubers and fruit.  She stocks up in the Ivory Coast and in Ghana.  Her customers are men, women, and children.  She wants to buy seven boxes of mangoes. She wants to save her profits. Her goals are to open a warehouse of tubers and fruit and to take better care of her children's education.

loans.use: to buy seven boxes of mangoes.

loans.name: Melodia

texts.en:
Melodia works hard to support her family. She is married and has a tailoring business in the Philippines.

Melodia requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy threads, needles, clothes and other supplies and materials for her business. She has been in this business for 16 years now.

In the future, Melodia would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy threads, needles, clothes and other supplies and materials for her business

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: After graduating from sixth grade, Esther decided to set up her own provision business in Mpohor, near Takoradi. With over 12 years of experience, she is currently looking to expand her enterprise further. Unfortunately, she is limited due to a lack of funding. As a result, this loan will be used to help her by purchase more items to stock her shop. She aims at using the profits from her business to help support her husband, who is a farmer, with the upkeep of their house whilst ensuring that their 5 children are able to experience a better life.

loans.use: to buy items to stock her store.

loans.name: Sreypov's Group

texts.en:
A mother of five children, three schoolchildren and two little kids, Sreypov is rice grower living in Kampong Cham province. She has been in this business for ages, 15 years. 

Sreypov is the first time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She now leads a group of four to apply for a new loan in the amount of 1,000,000 KHR each. For Sreypov, she will utilize her loan to buy potash, herbicide, and rice seed for her crops. She hopes to make more income to expand her business and support her children’s education.

loans.use: To buy potash, herbicide, and rice seed for her crops

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en: Rosemarie is an industrious woman. She is 44 years old, a widow and a mother of two children. She is providing for her two children through her sari-sari store. She carefully manages to earn a higher income. Presently, she is asking for a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy canned goods, candies, breads, biscuits, noodles, spices, vinegar and soy sauce as additional goods to sell. She hopes this will boost her income in order to provide a better standard of living for her family, especially to save for her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, candies, breads, biscuits, noodles, spices, vinegar, and soy sauce to stock her store.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy is married to a small scale miner. She uses her income to help her husband pay the household expenses as well as save for a rainy day. 

As a Junior high school graduate, Mercy currently sells bread and milo beverage in Mphor (near  Takoradi). With over 3 years of experience in this trade,  Mercy sees an opportunity to expand her enterprise further. Nevertheless, she does not have the working capital necessary to increase her quantity of stock. Thus her loan will be used to buy more bread and milo, indirectly helping her boost her overall sales. 

Mercy wants to make her business self-sustainable as soon as possible. As a result, she plans to channel the new profits from her expanded business back into her enterprise.

loans.use: to buy bread and milo

loans.name: Joseph

texts.fr: Joseph est un jeune camerounais de 38 ans. Marié et père de 05 enfants dont le plus jeune a 04 ans et le plus âgé 16 ans dont 04 vont à l'école, Joseph afin de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille fabrique des marmites qu'il vend dans un quartier de la ville depuis près de 16 ans. Bien expérimenté dans ce domaine, joseph a une clientèle sans cesse grandissante et exigeante. Ne disposant pas d'assez de matières premières pour fabriquer des marmites en grande quantité, il souhaite avec l'argent du crédit acheter une grande quantité d'aluminium afin de fabriquer assez de marmites pour satisfaire sa clientèle. les bénéfices tirés de cette augmentation seront réinjectés dans l'activité et permettront à Joseph de garantir une bonne éducation à ses enfants.
texts.en: Joseph is a young 38-year old Cameroonian.  He is married and father of five children, of which the youngest is 4-years old and the oldest is 16-years old.  Four attend school.  In order to take care of his family's needs, Joseph has been making cooking pots that he sells in a neighborhood of the city for almost 16 years.  Very experienced in this domain, Joseph has an ever-growing and demanding clientele. Without enough raw materials to make large quantities of pots, Joseph would like to use the loan to buy a large quantity of aluminum in order to make enough pots to satisfy his customers.  The profits from this increase will be reinvested in his business and will allow Joseph to ensure a good education for his children.

loans.use: to buy aluminum.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is 36 years old, married and a father of two children. He sells automobile spare parts in Mpeketoni, Lamu for a living where he earns a monthly income of about KES 14, 000.
He was introduced to KADET LTD by our credit officer. He has applied for a loan of KES 60, 000 to purchase the additional stock of spare parts he needs.
Stephen intends to continue growing his business and hopes that one day he will own a well-established automobile garage.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of automobile spare parts.

loans.name: Bunthol

texts.en:
An elderly mother of five children, Bunthol is 57 years old and married. To support their living, she does rice growing on an area of two hectares and runs a small rice milling service in the local area in Kampong Cham province. She has been engaged in the current business for 15 years, earning almost 5USD per day. 

Bunthol has been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for two cycles including this loan. The past loan, which she has repaid back completely, improved her lifestyle gradually. For this cycle, she is seeking a new loan to buy rice seed, potash, and to buy a decent motorbike to support her business. She hopes to gain a high yield, better than last year, to better off her lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy rice seed, potash, and to buy a decent motorbike to support her business

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is a married woman and lives together with her husband in the village of Kwale, Mombasa. They live at a rental house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and rental bills.
For over two years, she has sold Khanga’s, an African women’s wrap, selling at the market. She says that her challenge is the high cost of purchasing her products. Fatuma dreams of expanding into a wholesale business to earn more income.
With the KES 25,000 she wants to purchase bales of Khanga’s for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of Khanga’s for resale.

loans.name: Ma. Richel

texts.en:
Ma. Richel is 29 years old and married with one child.
She earns a living by farming sugarcane in the Philippines. Ma. Richel is borrowing PHP 29,000 through NWTF to purchase additional fertilizers and other farm needs.
Ma. Richel has been farming sugarcane for 15 years and also earns additional income from selling jewelry.
She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save enough money so she could afford to send her child to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional fertilizers and other farm needs for her sugarcane crop.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth is a small scale baker who bakes bread to sell in Mpohor, near Takoradi. She has had some form of formal education, as she is a junior high school graduate. She is married and has 2 children. Her husband is a driver. Elizabeth has been working as a baker for close to three years. Her income is used to help her husband pay the utility bills and their children’s school fees. She plans on using her loan to purchase an increased quantity of flour and sugar to make her bread, thus allowing her to meet the rising customers’ demands. She hopes to use the profits from her enterprise to fulfill her dream of buying a bread stand, hence helping her sell from a fixed location in the future.

loans.use: to buy an increased quantity of flour and sugar to make her bread.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en: Rowena is a 41-year-old married woman from Ubay, Bohol. She has 6 children; the youngest child is 5 months old while the oldest is 21. She engages in farming by growing rice. She has been growing rice for 12 years. With a lack of capital to finance her farm, Rowena requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to buy fertilizers, pesticides and more rice seedlings to improve the harvest. Rowena would like to invest in her business to support her family and also to be able to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pesticides and more rice seedlings.
